original: med na bskyal bar bya ba'i phyir khyim pa la bcol te 'ong bar bya'o //
analyzed: med na bskyal bar bya ba'i phyir khyim pa la bcol te 'ong bar bya'o //
translated: If there is none, he should entrust the bowl to a layman and go.

original: bdag cag gis bskyal lo zhes zer na bzhag ste 'dong bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag cag gis bskyal lo zhes zer na bzhag ste 'dong bar bya'o //
translated: If they say, ‚ÄúWe will carry it,‚Äù he should leave it with them and go.

original: de dag gis ma bskyal na gnas par byed pa dag gis blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis ma bskyal na gnas par byed pa dag gis blang bar bya'o //
translated: If they do not carry it, those who are staying there should take it.

original: med na rang gis so //
analyzed: med na rang gis so //
translated: If there are none, he should take it himself.

original: thams cad kyis na gand'i brdung bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyis na gand'i brdung bar bya'o //
translated: In all cases, he should ring the gong.

original: yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang du rang gi don du stan dag g-yar po byed na sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: yon bdag gis gtsug lag khang du rang gi don du stan dag g-yar po byed na sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If a patron has borrowed seats for the sake of his own purpose in the monastery, he should give them.

original: de dag bsrung ba'i phyir dge slong yang gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag bsrung ba'i phyir dge slong yang gzhag par bya'o //
translated: In order to protect them, a monk should also be left behind.

original: des phyogs gcig tu bsdad par bya'o //
analyzed: des phyogs gcig tu bsdad par bya'o //
translated: He should sit in one place.

original: rang gi las mi nyams par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi las mi nyams par bya'o //
translated: He should not let his own work deteriorate.

original: sems gtad pa yang ngo //üîΩdong na brtul bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems gtad pa yang ngo // dong na brtul bar bya'o //
translated: He should also be attentive.üîΩIf he goes, he should be firm.

original: ma rung ba dag byi dor bya'o //
analyzed: ma rung ba dag byi dor bya'o //
translated: He should clean up any mess.

original: chang gis na chu dag gis so //
analyzed: chang gis na chu dag gis so //
translated: If it is beer, with water.

original: snum gyis na chal gyis so //
analyzed: snum gyis na chal gyis so //
translated: If it is oil, with ashes.

original: mi gtsang bas sa'am 'dag rdzas sam lcibs so //
analyzed: mi gtsang bas sa'am 'dag rdzas sam lcibs so //
translated: If it is feces, with earth, ashes, or chaff.

original: thags ma ma dag na gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: thags ma ma dag na gcad par bya'o //
translated: If the warp threads are not straight, they should be straightened.

original: khyim pa 'dug 'dug pa'i stan ma brtul ba mthong nas brtul bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pa 'dug 'dug pa'i stan ma brtul ba mthong nas brtul bar bya'o //
translated: If one sees a seat that belongs to a layperson left lying around, he should put it away.

original: gal te rgas pa dang nad pa yin na dge skos kyis so //
analyzed: gal te rgas pa dang nad pa yin na dge skos kyis so //
translated: If the person is old or sick, the monk in charge of duties should do it.

original: des sbran par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: des sbran par bya ba nyid do //
translated: He should be the one to announce it.

original: thams cad kyis nad pa la blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyis nad pa la blta bar bya'o //
translated: Everyone should look after the sick.

original: 'dug ste'o // der stan thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug ste'o // der stan thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: They should sit down there, but not stand up on the seat.

original: nad pa'i nad g-yogs gi sa der stan dag bsham par bya'o //
analyzed: nad pa'i nad g-yogs gi sa der stan dag bsham par bya'o //
translated: The attendants of the sick should set up seats there.

original: mkhan po'am slob dpon dge ba'i phyogs la 'gro na gal te gzhan gyis dge ba'i phyogs mi 'phel na phyi bzhin 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po'am slob dpon dge ba'i phyogs la 'gro na gal te gzhan gyis dge ba'i phyogs mi 'phel na phyi bzhin 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If the preceptor or the teacher is going to a virtuous place, if the other monks‚Äô virtuous qualities will not increase, they should follow him.

original: de'i phyir rang gis stan bkur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gis stan bkur bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, he should carry his own seat.

original: 'gro ba ma zhus par mi bkur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma zhus par mi bkur ro //
translated: He should not carry the seat of someone who has not asked him to.

original: de rang gnyid kyis bkur ro //
analyzed: de rang gnyid kyis bkur ro //
translated: He should carry his own seat.

original: bla ga ba med par chos nyan pa na rlung dang char byung na brtul par bya'o //
analyzed: bla ga ba med par chos nyan pa na rlung dang char byung na brtul par bya'o //
translated: If the Dharma listener is without an upper robe and it rains or the wind blows, he should put it away.

original: rgan po rnams kyi lci ba nyid kyi phyir rang gis mi nus na gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig brje bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgan po rnams kyi lci ba nyid kyi phyir rang gis mi nus na gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig brje bar bya'o //
translated: If the old ones are heavy, and he is unable to carry them, he should exchange them with the young ones.

original: mthun pa dang mthun par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: mthun pa dang mthun par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should place them in a suitable place.

original: gtsug lag khang gzhan du gdan cha dang rdzas rnyed na bkur bar bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gzhan du gdan cha dang rdzas rnyed na bkur bar bya'o //
translated: If he finds a seat or a requisite in another temple, he should take it.

original: gal te char 'bab pa dang char 'bab tu dogs pa med na'o //
analyzed: gal te char 'bab pa dang char 'bab tu dogs pa med na'o //
translated: If there is no rain or fear of rain.

original: gal te lam kar rlung dang char pa byung na @32b shing ljon pa'am rtsig drung du bcer bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te lam kar rlung dang char pa byung na @32b shing ljon pa'am rtsig drung du bcer bar bya'o //
translated: If there is wind or rain on the road, he should go to a tree or a wall.

original: rdzas ngan pa gcig gis g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzas ngan pa gcig gis g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: He should cover himself with one bad cloth.

original: gtsug lag khang du phyin nas rdzas rnams bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du phyin nas rdzas rnams bskam par bya'o //
translated: Having gone to the temple, he should dry the things.

original: me shor ram chu byung ba na dge 'dun gyi yang gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: me shor ram chu byung ba na dge 'dun gyi yang gdon par bya'o //
translated: If there is a fire or water, he should also take the Sa·πÖgha‚Äôs things.

original: rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos thon zin na'o //
analyzed: rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos thon zin na'o //
translated: If his own bowl and robes are already out.

original: bton zin pa bsrung ba'i phyir dge slong chen po mi nus pa gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bton zin pa bsrung ba'i phyir dge slong chen po mi nus pa gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should leave a senior monk who is unable to do so in order to protect what has been taken out.

original: mi bzod pa nyid du 'jug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi bzod pa nyid du 'jug par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not enter into intolerance.

original: gnas mal gyi ltung byed do /
analyzed: gnas mal gyi ltung byed do /
translated: This is the downfall.

original: // / khyim gzhan du gding ba byas la khyim bdag la dris te dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / khyim gzhan du gding ba byas la khyim bdag la dris te dor bar bya'o //
translated: In a house, one should remove the bedding after asking the householder.

original: dgon par ni yang na slong bar bya'o //
analyzed: dgon par ni yang na slong bar bya'o //
translated: In a wilderness area, one should either take it away or roll it up.

original: de ni mgo dang mjug bzlog pa byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni mgo dang mjug bzlog pa byas pa nyid do //
translated: This is the reversal of the beginning and end.

original: gos dag bskam pa'i phyir rtsva bting ba yang dor bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: gos dag bskam pa'i phyir rtsva bting ba yang dor bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should also remove the grass spread out for drying the robes.

original: slong ba la dor bar khas len na sbyin no //
analyzed: slong ba la dor bar khas len na sbyin no //
translated: If the householder agrees to give it to the mendicants, one should give it.

original: 'chag sa dag tu rkang mthil gnyis la rtsub na rtsva dag gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'chag sa dag tu rkang mthil gnyis la rtsub na rtsva dag gding bar bya'o //
translated: On the walkways, if the soles of the feet are rough, one should spread out grass.

original: de dag kyang dor bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de dag kyang dor bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should also remove that.

original: btang na dor bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid du ma gyur pa dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: btang na dor bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid du ma gyur pa dor bar bya'o //
translated: If it is given, it is not to be removed.

original: gzhan gyi tshe na dus dus su so sor brtag pa dang bsgyur bzlog bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe na dus dus su so sor brtag pa dang bsgyur bzlog bya'o //
translated: At other times, one should examine it from time to time and reverse it.

original: sa snum pa dang mngar bar ni nyin re zhing ngo //
analyzed: sa snum pa dang mngar bar ni nyin re zhing ngo //
translated: On oily or sweet earth, every day.

original: gzhan du ni zla ba phyed cing ngo //
analyzed: gzhan du ni zla ba phyed cing ngo //
translated: Elsewhere, every half month.

original: 'chags dag tu rtsva'i chun po dag thag pas bcings te shing ljon pa la bcangs shing gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'chags dag tu rtsva'i chun po dag thag pas bcings te shing ljon pa la bcangs shing gzhag par bya'o //
translated: In the rainy season, one should tie bundles of grass with rope and hang them on trees.

original: lci ba dang gyo mor gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: lci ba dang gyo mor gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place them on a heavy stone or on a mound of sand.

original: gnas nas 'phags par 'gyur ba na zhes bya ba yan chad sngar thal ba'o //
analyzed: gnas nas 'phags par 'gyur ba na zhes bya ba yan chad sngar thal ba'o //
translated: The rest is as stated previously.

original: cig car spyod pa ni 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: cig car spyod pa ni 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: The offense is similar in the case of a shared dwelling.

original: dge 'dun gyi ma yin pa ni gnas de'i bdag po rnams la dri bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi ma yin pa ni gnas de'i bdag po rnams la dri bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: If it is not the Sa·πÖgha‚Äôs, one should ask the owners.

original: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dang / rdo ba dang bye ma'i gzhi nyid la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa nyid dang / de lta bu'i nyes dmigs yod pa nyid kyi gzhir rang ngam bskos pas gding ba byas pa nyid lta bu ni byed pa po dag yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dang / rdo ba dang bye ma'i gzhi nyid la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa nyid dang / de lta bu'i nyes dmigs yod pa nyid kyi gzhir rang ngam bskos pas gding ba byas pa nyid lta bu ni byed pa po dag yin no //
translated: If it is the Sa·πÖgha‚Äôs, but it is not the dwelling itself, or the floor, or the ground of stones and sand, etc., then the one who has spread it, either himself or by proxy, is the one who commits the offense.

original: gding ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: gding ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The offense of improper spreading.

original: // / dge slong nyid dang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dag ni byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: // / dge slong nyid dang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nyid dag ni byed pa po nyid do //
translated: The monk himself and the dwelling of the Sa·πÖgha are the ones who commit the offense.

original: gal te de la gnod pa dang dge 'dun 'khrug pa skye ba nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnyen pho 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de la gnod pa dang dge 'dun 'khrug pa skye ba nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnyen pho 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: If he does not, he commits an offense entailing confession if he does not pacify the harm and the schism in the sa·πÖgha.

original: skrod pa la'o //
analyzed: skrod pa la'o //
translated: In the case of expulsion.

original: gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
translated: By another.

original: gzhan gyis rjes su 'jug pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rjes su 'jug pas kyang ngo //
translated: By one who is following another.

original: dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams @33a * //
analyzed: dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams @33a * //
translated: The probationary nuns, the novice monks, and the novice nuns

original: kyis ni nyes byas kyi'o //
analyzed: kyis ni nyes byas kyi'o //
translated: commit an offense of wrong conduct.

original: de dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: de dag kyang ngo //
translated: They also.

original: bzhad gad kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: bzhad gad kyis kyang ngo //
translated: By laughing.

original: khyim pa rnams la ni bsod nams ma yin pa mang ngo //
analyzed: khyim pa rnams la ni bsod nams ma yin pa mang ngo //
translated: The householders have much demerit.

original: skrod pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: skrod pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall of expulsion.

original: // / shes gtso'o //
analyzed: // / shes gtso'o //
translated: The main point is knowledge.

original: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi gnas su dge slong zhugs pa nyid la'o ;
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi gnas su dge slong zhugs pa nyid la'o ;
translated: In the case of a monk who has entered the dwelling of the sa·πÖgha.

original: / na ba dang 'jigs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par phyis gnon byed pa la'o //
analyzed: / na ba dang 'jigs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par phyis gnon byed pa la'o //
translated: Except if he is sick or in danger, if he presses down on it later.

original: de ni dpe ste /
analyzed: de ni dpe ste /
translated: This is the example.

original: mtho 'tshams par 'dun pas dge slong la mtho 'tshams pa dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: mtho 'tshams par 'dun pas dge slong la mtho 'tshams pa dag kyang ngo //
translated: If he has the intention to annoy a monk, he also commits an offense entailing confession.

original: phyis gnon gyi ltung byed do /
analyzed: phyis gnon gyi ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall of pressing down.

original: // / dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog nyid ni byed pa po'o ;
analyzed: // / dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog nyid ni byed pa po'o ;
translated: The upper story of the monastery is the place.

original: / gal te byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam spang le ba nyid dam de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin na'o //
analyzed: / gal te byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam spang le ba nyid dam de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin na'o //
translated: If it is not covered with plaster, or with a layer of clay, or with something similar.

original: mnan par 'os pa'i rtsa ba phur bu lta bu nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: mnan par 'os pa'i rtsa ba phur bu lta bu nyid kyang ngo //
translated: The pegs for the ropes are the objects.

original: bkan pa nyid dang rkang gtan bcug pa nyid ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: bkan pa nyid dang rkang gtan bcug pa nyid ni ma gtogs so //
translated: Except for the holes for the door bolts and the door hinges.

original: gnon pa la'o //
analyzed: gnon pa la'o //
translated: In order to cover.üîΩThe knowledge is the principal.

original: shes gtso'o // rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: shes gtso'o // rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The root downfall is to live in a place where there are life forms.

original: // / rang spyod pa'i don nyid de las gzhan la'o //
analyzed: // / rang spyod pa'i don nyid de las gzhan la'o //
translated: The place is elsewhere, not where one lives.

original: srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The objects are life forms.

original: // / sgo cha gzhug par bya'o //üîΩsgo glegs dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: // / sgo cha gzhug par bya'o // sgo glegs dag kyang ngo //
translated: The door frame should be installed.üîΩThe door panels should be installed.

original: skar khung dag kyang gdod par bya'o //
analyzed: skar khung dag kyang gdod par bya'o //
translated: The windows should be installed.

original: gtsug lag khang ni byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang ni byed pa po nyid do //
translated: The place is the monastery.

original: spyod lam bzhi shong ba la'o //
analyzed: spyod lam bzhi shong ba la'o //
translated: The action is to make it suitable for the four types of deportment.

original: gal te thams cad rdo'am so phag gam shing las byas pa ma yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te thams cad rdo'am so phag gam shing las byas pa ma yin na'o //
translated: Except if they are made of stone, brick, or wood.

original: char chu bskyabs pa'i g-yogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: char chu bskyabs pa'i g-yogs pa yang ngo //
translated: Also a roof to protect from rain.

original: yon bdag gis byas sam zin nas blta'o zhes ma smras pa la'o //
analyzed: yon bdag gis byas sam zin nas blta'o zhes ma smras pa la'o //
translated: If the owner has made it, or if he has given his consent.

original: pha gu'i rim pa gsum las lhag par rtsig pa byas pa la'o //
analyzed: pha gu'i rim pa gsum las lhag par rtsig pa byas pa la'o //
translated: If the wall is more than three stories high.

original: gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
translated: Also if it is made by another.

original: nyi ma de la'o //
analyzed: nyi ma de la'o //
translated: On that day.

original: gzhan la yang 'jim pa med pa las so //
analyzed: gzhan la yang 'jim pa med pa las so //
translated: Also if there is no clay.

original: chu khung dag ma gtod pa yang rung ngo //
analyzed: chu khung dag ma gtod pa yang rung ngo //

original: brkos te rmang gi rtsa ba ma btsugs pa nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: brkos te rmang gi rtsa ba ma btsugs pa nyid kyang ngo //
translated: If it is dug out and the foundation is not set.

original: sgo cha gong ma ma bcug pa yang rung ngo //
analyzed: sgo cha gong ma ma bcug pa yang rung ngo //
translated: Or if the upper part of the door is not put in place.

original: dang po'i mdun rol la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: dang po'i mdun rol la ni nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if it is the first time and he does it in front of the elders.

original: gtsug lag khang gi ltung byed do /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall of a novice nun is to build a hut without having the measurements.

original: // / pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa lo nyi shu las mi nyung ba grong khyer pa'i skad smra ba dge slong ma la lus nye bar gzhol ba nyid phyir bcos pa byas pa dge slong ma'i ston par
analyzed: // / pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa lo nyi shu las mi nyung ba grong khyer pa'i skad smra ba dge slong ma la lus nye bar gzhol ba nyid phyir bcos pa byas pa dge slong ma'i ston par
translated: The monk who has not committed a defeating offense, who is twenty years old or more, who is learned in the s≈´tras, the vinaya, and the mƒÅt·πõkƒÅ, who speaks the local language, who has made amends for any physical contact with a nun, who has been appointed as the teacher of nuns,

original: bsko'o // gso sbyong bco lnga pa la'o //
analyzed: bsko'o // gso sbyong bco lnga pa la'o //
translated: and who is present at the po·π£adha on the fifteenth day of the month.

original: mtshams kyi nang du'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du'o //
translated: He must be within the same boundary.

original: @33b mdo sde la sogs pa 'dzin pa med na so sor thar pa thon pa'o //
analyzed: @33b mdo sde la sogs pa 'dzin pa med na so sor thar pa thon pa'o //
translated: If there are no holders of the s≈´tras and so on, then the pratimok·π£a must be recited.

original: de yang na pham par 'gyur ba'am lci ba'i chos rnams ston nus pa'o //
analyzed: de yang na pham par 'gyur ba'am lci ba'i chos rnams ston nus pa'o //
translated: He must be able to teach the defeating offenses and the serious dharmas.

original: phyi ma ni sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
analyzed: phyi ma ni sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
translated: The latter is as follows: ‚ÄúSisters, is the sa·πÖgha of nuns complete?

original: yongs su dag gam mthun nam kha na mtho ba med dam /
analyzed: yongs su dag gam mthun nam kha na mtho ba med dam /
translated: Are you pure? Are you in harmony? Are there any grounds for censure?

original: khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
analyzed: khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
translated: Has any individual who has not been appointed by the sa·πÖgha been teaching you? Your teacher will come from the sa·πÖgha.‚Äù

original: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
analyzed: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWe do not want to teach any of you nuns.‚Äù

original: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
analyzed: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
translated: ‚ÄúYou should receive instructions and teachings from the Sa·πÖgha.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúSisters, practice heedfully.‚Äù

original: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa'o //üîΩchos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa'o // chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa ni ma gtogs so //

translated: When invited to a house, one should accept the invitation.üîΩOne should go at the appointed time, not too early.

analyzed: de'i gand'i brdungs te rang gi 'khor la blta bar bya'o // glo bur du 'ongs pa la ni gnas brtan gyis so //

analyzed: skom gyi phyir gsol ba dag 'debs na bsdad par bya'o //

analyzed: cig car yang rung phyis kyang rung ste gos kyi rnyed pa med pa'i mgron du bos pa gnyis pa gnyis rnyed na'o //

original: bza' bar bya ba la'o //
analyzed: bza' bar bya ba la'o //

original: lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa la'o //

original: gal te gzhan yang de nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhan yang de nyid yin na'o //

original: na ba ma yin pa dang las ma byas pa dang lam du ma song ba la'o //
analyzed: na ba ma yin pa dang las ma byas pa dang lam du ma song ba la'o //
translated: If one is not sick, if one has not done the work, if one has not gone on the journey.

original: dang du blangs nas nyes byas kyi'o ;
analyzed: dang du blangs nas nyes byas kyi'o ;
translated: If one accepts, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: / zos na dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: / zos na dngos gzhi'o //

original: 'dir gos kyi mthar gyur pa ni khru gang gi khyon no //
analyzed: 'dir gos kyi mthar gyur pa ni khru gang gi khyon no //
translated: Here, the limit of cloth is one cubit.

original: lam ni dpag tshad phyed do //
analyzed: lam ni dpag tshad phyed do //

original: gzhan la yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan la yang ngo //

original: 'dir ram grur 'gro ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir ram grur 'gro ba la yang ngo //
translated: Here, it is also for one who is going in a boat.

original: las ni phyag dar re lde tsam mam dkyil 'khor ba mal tsam yin na'o //
analyzed: las ni phyag dar re lde tsam mam dkyil 'khor ba mal tsam yin na'o //
translated: The limit of work is sweeping or smearing a place the size of a circular area of four by four cubits.

original: de yang dge 'dun gyi nyid dam mchod rten gyi nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: de yang dge 'dun gyi nyid dam mchod rten gyi nyid yin na'o //
translated: It is also for the community or for a st≈´pa.

original: na ba nyid kyi tshad ni mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: na ba nyid kyi tshad ni mi nus pa'o //
translated: The limit of sickness is being unable to walk.

original: bshams pa ni mgron du bos pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: bshams pa ni mgron du bos pa nyid ma yin no //

original: kun tu lta ba yang ngo //
analyzed: kun tu lta ba yang ngo //
translated: and when he is looking around.

analyzed: mgron du bos pa gzhan yod na zan snga ma la spong ba bsrung zhing 'jug par bya'o //
translated: If there is another invitation, he should protect the earlier one and go to the later one.

original: mtho 'tshams pas byas pa ni ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtho 'tshams pas byas pa ni ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: He should not go out of a desire to criticize.

original: mi rung ba la bos pa yang ngo //üîΩde'i phyir ma yin par dge 'dun yang ngo //
analyzed: mi rung ba la bos pa yang ngo // de'i phyir ma yin par dge 'dun yang ngo //

original: gzhan du lnga po 'jog pa yang ngo //üîΩde ni chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du lnga po 'jog pa yang ngo // de ni chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: He should not go to an invitation of an individual if he is not wanted by that individual.

original: gzhan blang ba la yang ngo //üîΩmu ge byung na mgron du bos pa ji snyed byung ba dag bdag gir bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan blang ba la yang ngo // mu ge byung na mgron du bos pa ji snyed byung ba dag bdag gir bya'o //
translated: He should not go to an invitation if he has been invited elsewhere.üîΩIf there is a famine, he should accept as many invitations as he can get.

original: zos na yang ngo //
analyzed: zos na yang ngo //
translated: He should eat at the invitation.

original: sbyin du yang rung ngo //
analyzed: sbyin du yang rung ngo //
translated: He should give the invitation to someone else.

original: sbyin pa po mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ba lta na kham gnyis sam gsum zos pa'i 'og tu khyim bdag dge slong 'di bsod snyoms kyis phongs pa yin gyis rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig dang 'di la sbyin par bya'o zhes mngon par dga' bar byas
analyzed: sbyin pa po mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ba lta na kham gnyis sam gsum zos pa'i 'og tu khyim bdag dge slong 'di bsod snyoms kyis phongs pa yin gyis rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig dang 'di la sbyin par bya'o zhes mngon par dga' bar byas
translated: If the donor is not pleased, he should say, ‚ÄúThis monk is in need of almsfood. Rejoice, for you will receive a great reward.‚Äù

original: nas so // yang yang za ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: nas so // yang yang za ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who eats it.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the monk who stays in the house of a non-Buddhist, a householder, or a heretic.

original: // / @35a * //  chos 'di pa ma yin pa bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa ya mtshan can thams cad ma yin pa'i 'dug gnas so //üîΩmi na ba la'o //
analyzed: // / @35a * //  chos 'di pa ma yin pa bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa ya mtshan can thams cad ma yin pa'i 'dug gnas so // mi na ba la'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who stays there without being ill.

original: sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa la'o //
analyzed: sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa la'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who eats the food of a patron who has not been assigned to him.

original: de'i zas ni zos pa la dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i zas ni zos pa la dngos gzhi'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who eats the food of the patron who has been assigned to him.

original: gnas na zhag lon pa la nyes byas kyi'o //
analyzed: gnas na zhag lon pa la nyes byas kyi'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who stays there for more than one night.

original: bdag po med pa yang ngo //
analyzed: bdag po med pa yang ngo //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who stays in a house that belongs to no one.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the monk who stays in a house that belongs to a non-Buddhist, a heretic, or a renunciate who is not a Buddhist.

original: 'di la rab tu byung ba 'di pa ni mu stegs can dang 'dra ba nyid do //üîΩnye dus kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'di la rab tu byung ba 'di pa ni mu stegs can dang 'dra ba nyid do // nye dus kyang ngo //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who stays in a house that belongs to a relative.

original: 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed do /üîΩ// / stobs pa'i 'o //üîΩyongs su ma spags par ro //
analyzed: 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed do / // / stobs pa'i 'o // yongs su ma spags par ro //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who stays in a house that belongs to a Buddhist renunciate.

original: ci bder ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: ci bder ma byas pa'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who eats the food of a patron who has not been assigned to him.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the monk who eats the food of a patron who has been assigned to him.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the monk who eats the food of a patron who has not been assigned to him.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the monk who eats the food of a patron who has been assigned to him.

original: khyim pa'i'o // bre'u chung dag gi tshad ni 'bras thug po che ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lnga bcos pa'i tshod ma ma gtogs pa las lhag pa'i bsod snyoms te grogs kyi skal ba dang yang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: khyim pa'i'o // bre'u chung dag gi tshad ni 'bras thug po che ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lnga bcos pa'i tshod ma ma gtogs pa las lhag pa'i bsod snyoms te grogs kyi skal ba dang yang bcas pa yin no //
translated: The alms-food of a monk is the food which he receives in a bowl of the prescribed size, which is less than a Magadha-dron of boiled rice and condiments.

original: zos pa na'o //üîΩmnos pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zos pa na'o // mnos pa'i 'o //
translated: When he has eaten.üîΩWhen he has accepted.

original: de la ni nyes byas kyi'o //üîΩgzhan gyis mnos pa yang ngo //üîΩgzhan la ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: de la ni nyes byas kyi'o // gzhan gyis mnos pa yang ngo // gzhan la ni ltung ba med do //
translated: In this case, it is a minor offense.üîΩIf he has accepted from another.üîΩIf he has accepted from another, there is no offense.

original: las su ma byas pa yang ngo //
analyzed: las su ma byas pa yang ngo //
translated: If he has not prepared it himself.

original: blang bar bya ba gal te mang ba nyid na dge slong dag la bgo bsha' bya'o //
analyzed: blang bar bya ba gal te mang ba nyid na dge slong dag la bgo bsha' bya'o //
translated: If there is a great deal of food to be accepted, it should be distributed to the monks.

original: ltung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: ltung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: If he accepts more than three bowls, it is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: // / ji tsam gyis chog pa bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / ji tsam gyis chog pa bza' bar bya'o //
translated: He should eat as much as he needs.

original: zas brtsams pa las ldang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: zas brtsams pa las ldang bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not get up from his meal.

original: tha na lan tshva yan chad bza' bar bya ba gang yang rung ba cung zad cig blangs na rnam pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: tha na lan tshva yan chad bza' bar bya ba gang yang rung ba cung zad cig blangs na rnam pa de nyid yin no //
translated: If he accepts any of the following, even a little, such as salt, it is the same offense:

original: spangs pa ni gnas btang ba'o //
analyzed: spangs pa ni gnas btang ba'o //
translated: Abandoning is giving up the place.

original: 'dug pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa'i 'o //
translated: Sitting is sitting down.

original: rtsa ba la sogs pa bca' bar bya ba la sogs pa'i zas brtsams pa'i'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba la sogs pa bca' bar bya ba la sogs pa'i zas brtsams pa'i'o //
translated: The food that is to be prepared, such as roots, etc.

original: rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bca' bar bya ba dag dang / thug pa las gzhan pa bza' bar bya ba rung ba mi rung ba dang ma 'dres pa'i byin len stobs pa 'thob pa'i phyogs na 'greng ba spang ba byas nas so //üîΩgsol cig ces bya ba yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu bca' bar bya ba dag dang / thug pa las gzhan pa bza' bar bya ba rung ba mi rung ba dang ma 'dres pa'i byin len stobs pa 'thob pa'i phyogs na 'greng ba spang ba byas nas so // gsol cig ces bya ba yang de nyid yin no //
translated: The food that is to be prepared, such as roots, stems, leaves, flowers, and fruits, and the food that is to be eaten, such as gruel, etc., which is suitable, unmixed with what is unsuitable, and given with the ritual of giving and receiving, should be obtained while standing in a place where one can see the other.üîΩThe words please give are also like that.

original: song shig ces bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: song shig ces bya ba yang ngo //
translated: The words please go are also like that.

original: 'tshal lags so zhes bya bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'tshal lags so zhes bya bas kyang ngo //
translated: The words I have eaten are also like that.

original: re zhig ces bya ba'i sgra nye bar sbyar na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig ces bya ba'i sgra nye bar sbyar na ni ma yin no //
translated: If the word only is added, it is not.

original: chog go zhes bya ba yang ngo //üîΩkha gzar gyen du 'greng du mi btub pa nyid kyi thug pa dag ni thug pa nyid do //
analyzed: chog go zhes bya ba yang ngo // kha gzar gyen du 'greng du mi btub pa nyid kyi thug pa dag ni thug pa nyid do //
translated: The words I have had enough are also like that.üîΩGruel is that which cannot be held up with the fingers.

original: sor mo la mi mngon pa ni skyo ma'i 'o //
analyzed: sor mo la mi mngon pa ni skyo ma'i 'o //
translated: The gruel is that which cannot be held up with the fingers.

original: @35b mtho 'tshams pa ni byin len stobs pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: @35b mtho 'tshams pa ni byin len stobs pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The excess is not the same as the blessing.

original: mtshams kyi phyi rol dang mi 'thob pa'i phyogs dang mdun ma yin pa na 'dug pa las lhag por bya ba mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mtshams kyi phyi rol dang mi 'thob pa'i phyogs dang mdun ma yin pa na 'dug pa las lhag por bya ba mi 'byung ngo //
translated: The excess is not produced if one is outside the enclosure, in a place where one cannot reach, or in front of the food.

original: bya ba lag tu ma blangs pa la yang mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bya ba lag tu ma blangs pa la yang mi 'byung ngo //
translated: The excess is not produced if one has not taken hold of the action.

original: rung ba ma yin pa dang de dang 'dres pa la ni mi bya ba nyid do ;
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa dang de dang 'dres pa la ni mi bya ba nyid do ;
translated: It is not produced if the food is not suitable or is mixed with what is not suitable.

original: / gnas ma btang bas bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: / gnas ma btang bas bya ba nyid do //
translated: The excess is produced by the non-abandoning of the place.

original: mi bza' bar brtag pa byas pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: mi bza' bar brtag pa byas pas kyang ngo //
translated: The excess is produced by the examination of what is not to be eaten.

original: gsol bas bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gsol bas bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The excess is produced by the request.

original: khyod kyir gyur gyis bzhud cig ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: khyod kyir gyur gyis bzhud cig ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: The excess is produced by the words: ‚ÄúIt is yours; go away.‚Äù

original: kha cig ni bder gsol cig ces kyang ngo //
analyzed: kha cig ni bder gsol cig ces kyang ngo //
translated: Some say: ‚ÄúEat well.‚Äù

original: kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas so ;
analyzed: kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas so ;
translated: The excess is produced by eating two or three mouthfuls.

original: / bya ba btang bas ni bza' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: / bya ba btang bas ni bza' bar mi bya'o //
translated: The excess is not produced if one abandons the action.

original: lhag por byas pa gzhan gyis bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhag por byas pa gzhan gyis bza' bar bya'o //
translated: The excess is produced by another who eats the food which has been made an excess.

original: shes gtso'o // spangs pa nyid dang lhag por ma byas pa nyid dag la'o //
analyzed: shes gtso'o // spangs pa nyid dang lhag por ma byas pa nyid dag la'o //
translated: The excess is produced by the knowledge of the abandonment and of the non-excess.

original: zos na'o // zas tsam mo //
analyzed: zos na'o // zas tsam mo //
translated: Just the food.

original: lhan cig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed do /
analyzed: lhan cig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is created by eating the food of a donor who is a friend of both oneself and another monk.

original: // / stobs na'o//
analyzed: // / stobs na'o//
translated: When one is strong.

original: dge slong la'o //
analyzed: dge slong la'o //
translated: With regard to a monk.

original: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is created by giving food to a monk who has renounced the world.

original: // / shes gtso'o //üîΩso sor nges pa'i zas kyi gnas can dag las gzhan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun du gyur pa mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dag gi zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: // / shes gtso'o // so sor nges pa'i zas kyi gnas can dag las gzhan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun du gyur pa mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dag gi zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid la'o //
translated: When one is knowledgeable.üîΩThe downfall is created by eating food that is not shared with the community of monks who are present within the boundaries of the monastery and who are not of a different order.

original: lhan cig pa'i'o //üîΩcig car za ba dang ngo //
analyzed: lhan cig pa'i'o // cig car za ba dang ngo //
translated: The downfall is created by eating food that is shared with the community of monks who are present within the boundaries of the monastery and who are not of a different order.üîΩThe downfall is created by eating food at the same time as the other monks.

original: gsum la sogs pa dang ngo //üîΩdge slong rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: gsum la sogs pa dang ngo // dge slong rnams kyi'o //
translated: The downfall is created by eating food at the same time as three or more monks.üîΩThe downfall is created by eating food that is not shared with the community of monks.

original: dge slong rnam pa ji lta bus gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa byed pa po nyid yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dge slong rnam pa ji lta bus gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa byed pa po nyid yin pa bzhin no //
translated: The downfall is created by a monk who acts as the recipient of food that is not shared with the community of monks.

original: dus ston chen po las gzhan pa la'o //
analyzed: dus ston chen po las gzhan pa la'o //
translated: The downfall is created by eating food that is not given in a great festival.

original: rtags 'di med pas rab tu byung ba'i zas las gzhan pa'o//
analyzed: rtags 'di med pas rab tu byung ba'i zas las gzhan pa'o//
translated: The downfall is created by eating food that is not given to one who does not have the signs of a monk.

original: zos na'o // der 'ong bar bya ba nyid du gnas pa mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa dag gis 'ong ba nyid ma dris par za na 'da' ba'i phyed nyid do //
analyzed: zos na'o // der 'ong bar bya ba nyid du gnas pa mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa dag gis 'ong ba nyid ma dris par za na 'da' ba'i phyed nyid do //
translated: If he eats it without asking the resident monks whether or not they will come, it is a partial defeat.

original: gang yang rung ba cung zad cig brims na yang zan gcig pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba cung zad cig brims na yang zan gcig pa nyid yin no //
translated: If he eats it after distributing it to any of the resident monks, it is a partial defeat.üîΩIf he eats it without the consent of all the resident monks, except if he is sick, on the road, or if it is a special occasion, it is a partial defeat.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host, not by the guests.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.

original: 'gro bar chas pa dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / nad pa dang nad g-yog dang dge skos las gzhan pas thams cad kyis ma zos par g-yos mal dang spyi bungs las mnos te bza' bar mi bya'o //üîΩ'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: 'gro bar chas pa dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / nad pa dang nad g-yog dang dge skos las gzhan pas thams cad kyis ma zos par g-yos mal dang spyi bungs las mnos te bza' bar mi bya'o // 'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.

original: // / rang gi phyed yol nas skya rengs 'char ba'i bar ni dus ma yin no //üîΩde nyid la shes gtso'o//üîΩ@36a * // bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba zos na'o //
analyzed: // / rang gi phyed yol nas skya rengs 'char ba'i bar ni dus ma yin no // de nyid la shes gtso'o// @36a * // bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba zos na'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.üîΩThe downfall is accrued by the host if he eats the food without the consent of all the resident monks.

original: dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is accrued by the host if

original: // / snga dro ba'i zas byin len byas pa phyi dro ba'i zas su dang / de thun tshod las 'das pa lta bu ni sog 'jog byas pa yin no //
analyzed: // / snga dro ba'i zas byin len byas pa phyi dro ba'i zas su dang / de thun tshod las 'das pa lta bu ni sog 'jog byas pa yin no //
translated: The food of the morning meal that has been accepted is the food of the evening meal, and that which has passed the time is stored.

original: de nyid la shes gtso'o //
analyzed: de nyid la shes gtso'o //
translated: It is the same for the other meals.

original: lag nyar blangs pa mid par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lag nyar blangs pa mid par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not swallow what has been put in the mouth without chewing it.

original: mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang zhag lon pa yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang zhag lon pa yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not cook inside the monastery enclosure, nor should one keep food overnight.

original: dge slong gis btsos pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dge slong gis btsos pa yang ngo //
translated: Nor should one eat the food cooked by a monk.

original: 'dir rjen pa btsos pa gang yin pa ni de'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dir rjen pa btsos pa gang yin pa ni de'i 'o //
translated: Here, what is raw is cooked, and what is cooked is raw.

original: mi snyi ba rnams kyi ni sum cha bdas pa nyid kyi mdun rol du de nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi snyi ba rnams kyi ni sum cha bdas pa nyid kyi mdun rol du de nyid yin no //
translated: For those who are not tender, it is the same as before, after removing one third.

original: snyi ba rnams kyi ni kha dog gyur pa'i'o //
analyzed: snyi ba rnams kyi ni kha dog gyur pa'i'o //
translated: For those who are tender, it is the color change.

original: khu ba rnams kyi ni lan gnyis khol bar gyur pa nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: khu ba rnams kyi ni lan gnyis khol bar gyur pa nyid kyi'o //
translated: For liquids, it is after boiling twice.

original: mes rung bar byas pa ni ma btsos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mes rung bar byas pa ni ma btsos pa ma yin no //
translated: What is made suitable by fire is not uncooked.

original: 'dug pa'i 'grub pa nyid skye ba la rag las pa ni ma lon pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dug pa'i 'grub pa nyid skye ba la rag las pa ni ma lon pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: What is accomplished by sitting is not unaccomplished, as it depends on arising.

original: snod phyogs na 'dug na des kyang sa der btsos pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: snod phyogs na 'dug na des kyang sa der btsos pa nyid yin no //
translated: If the vessel is placed in a certain direction, the food is cooked in that direction.

original: 'tshod par byed pa de na 'dug pa nyid kyis ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'tshod par byed pa de na 'dug pa nyid kyis ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not cooked by the heat which is in the vessel.

original: me ni snod ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: me ni snod ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Fire is not a non-vessel.

original: de las phyung ba dang byung ba dag ni de nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de las phyung ba dang byung ba dag ni de nyid ma yin no //
translated: The food which is taken out of the vessel and the food which is not yet put into the vessel are not cooked.

original: nye 'khor ni gnas nyid yin no //üîΩ'dom gang ngo //
analyzed: nye 'khor ni gnas nyid yin no // 'dom gang ngo //
translated: The vicinity of the vessel is the vessel itself.üîΩOne cubit in height.

original: steng du nam mkha' la slebs pa man chad do //üîΩnang yang ngo //
analyzed: steng du nam mkha' la slebs pa man chad do // nang yang ngo //
translated: The space above the vessel, as far as the sky.üîΩThe inside of the vessel.

original: steng gi yang thog gzhan yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: steng gi yang thog gzhan yang de nyid yin no //
translated: The upper floor of a house is also a vessel.

original: gzhan gnas pa nyid ni gzhan gyi gnas nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gnas pa nyid ni gzhan gyi gnas nyid ma yin no //
translated: But the upper floor of another house is not the upper floor of the first house.

original: lag nyar blangs pa dang nang du btsos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa de dag dus kyi phyir dgag pa mdzad par 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dag ni ma bsdus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: lag nyar blangs pa dang nang du btsos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa de dag dus kyi phyir dgag pa mdzad par 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dag ni ma bsdus pa nyid yin no //
translated: The food which is held in the hand, the food which is being cooked, the food which is cooked by a bhik·π£u, are not included in the rule of the prohibition of keeping food overnight, because they are not kept overnight.

original: 'bags pa ni zas kyi phyed nyid do //
analyzed: 'bags pa ni zas kyi phyed nyid do //
translated: The food which is defiled is half of the food.

original: kha dri ma can gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: kha dri ma can gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang ngo //
translated: The food which is defiled by the mouth, and the drink which is defiled by the mouth.

original: de'i phyi rol ni lci ba'am sas kun nas drud de chus bshal na dag pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol ni lci ba'am sas kun nas drud de chus bshal na dag pa yin no //
translated: Outside, it is cleaned by rubbing it with ashes or earth, and washing it with water.

original: nang ni chu mkhur ba do'am gsum gyis bshal na'o //
analyzed: nang ni chu mkhur ba do'am gsum gyis bshal na'o //
translated: Inside, it is cleaned by rinsing it three times with water.

original: lhung bzed ni bsam pa thag pas lan gnyis lan gsum bkru bshal byas na sgra mi snyan yang dag pa nyid yin no //üîΩrtsi langs pa la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: lhung bzed ni bsam pa thag pas lan gnyis lan gsum bkru bshal byas na sgra mi snyan yang dag pa nyid yin no // rtsi langs pa la ni nyes pa med do //
translated: The bowl is cleaned by washing it with a cleansing substance, two or three times, with the greatest care.üîΩThere is no offense if the bowl is new, or if it is not leaking.

original: 'babs pa med par reg pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'babs pa med par reg pa la yang ngo //
translated: There is no offense if the bowl is not leaking, but is stained with oil.

original: 'dag rdzas sam lce ba'am sa gang yang rung bas lan gsum bkrus pa la snum pa nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'dag rdzas sam lce ba'am sa gang yang rung bas lan gsum bkrus pa la snum pa nyid kyang ngo //
translated: The bowl is cleaned by washing it three times with a cleansing substance, ashes, or earth.

original: langs pa bsal bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: langs pa bsal bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: The oil is removed by rubbing.

original: @36b 'bags pa'i phyogs de nyi tshe bkru bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: @36b 'bags pa'i phyogs de nyi tshe bkru bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: The stained part is washed separately.

original: bum pa la sogs pa snum bag can dag snum med par bya ba'i phyir chu'i rdzing bu zab mo'i nang du gzhug go //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa snum bag can dag snum med par bya ba'i phyir chu'i rdzing bu zab mo'i nang du gzhug go //
translated: Oily objects such as a bowl are cleaned by immersing them in a deep pool of water.

original: nya 'am rus sbal lam sbal pa'am chu srin byis pa gsod dam nya khyi ba dag gis ma lus par lhogs kyi bar du gzhag go //
analyzed: nya 'am rus sbal lam sbal pa'am chu srin byis pa gsod dam nya khyi ba dag gis ma lus par lhogs kyi bar du gzhag go //
translated: He should leave it there until it is completely eaten by fish, turtles, frogs, alligators, or water dogs.

original: bsregs pas kyang snum med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsregs pas kyang snum med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is burned, it will become free of oiliness.

original: snum med par gyur pa ni bkru bas so //
analyzed: snum med par gyur pa ni bkru bas so //
translated: If it becomes free of oiliness, it will be purified by washing.

original: 'dag rdzas sam lci bas 'dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dag rdzas sam lci bas 'dag pa nyid do //
translated: It will be purified by ashes or by clay.

original: lan tshva la sogs pa tshva chu dang 'gyur byed kyi chu dang rnyog chur gyur pa ni phyed nyid do //
analyzed: lan tshva la sogs pa tshva chu dang 'gyur byed kyi chu dang rnyog chur gyur pa ni phyed nyid do //
translated: If it is salty, etc., it will be purified by half that quantity of water for washing the mouth, water for purification, and muddy water.

original: de ni thams cad la dus ma yin par yang rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de ni thams cad la dus ma yin par yang rung ba nyid do //
translated: That is suitable at all times.

original: lan tshva dang 'gyur byed rang gi bya ba mi byed pa dag la ni nyes pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: lan tshva dang 'gyur byed rang gi bya ba mi byed pa dag la ni nyes pa med pa nyid do //
translated: There is no fault if salt and alkaline substances do not perform their functions.

original: tha ma la ni gzugs brnyan 'byung na'o //
analyzed: tha ma la ni gzugs brnyan 'byung na'o //
translated: If an image appears in the last,

original: ka ta ka'i 'bras bus chu shin tu 'dang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka ta ka'i 'bras bus chu shin tu 'dang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the water will be very clear by the fruit of the kataka tree.

original: 'gyur byed kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'gyur byed kyis kyang ngo //
translated: It will also be clear by alkaline substances.

original: zan gyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: zan gyis kyang ngo //
translated: It will also be clear by rice.

original: de mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir snum gyis bsku'o //
analyzed: de mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir snum gyis bsku'o //
translated: In order to prevent its destruction, it should be anointed with oil.

original: 'byung khungs dag tu btab pa mi mngon pa ni yod pa'i grangs nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung khungs dag tu btab pa mi mngon pa ni yod pa'i grangs nyid ma yin no //
translated: The non-manifestation of the contact in the source is not the same as the non-existence of the contact.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'dres par gyur na de nyi tshe bsal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'dres par gyur na de nyi tshe bsal ba nyid yin no //
translated: If it is mixed in one place, it is only a partial removal.

original: kha'i mchus reg pa la ni than kor yang ngo //
analyzed: kha'i mchus reg pa la ni than kor yang ngo //
translated: If it is touched with the lips, it is also a partial removal.

original: de dang 'brel ba'i rgyun gyis reg pa ni de la reg pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'brel ba'i rgyun gyis reg pa ni de la reg pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The contact by the stream related to that is not the contact of that.

original: nor ba dang brjed pas kyang ma yin no ;
analyzed: nor ba dang brjed pas kyang ma yin no ;
translated: It is not by mistake or by forgetting.

original: / de gnyis kyis spos pa bzhag pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
analyzed: / de gnyis kyis spos pa bzhag pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the two, mistake and forgetting, because they are set aside.

original: gnas kyi thag shin tu nye bar bkur ro //
analyzed: gnas kyi thag shin tu nye bar bkur ro //
translated: The place is very close.

original: g-yel bas lag nyar blangs pa nyid dang byin len blangs pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: g-yel bas lag nyar blangs pa nyid dang byin len blangs pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the taking of the hand or by the taking of the bowl.

original: byin len stobs par 'os pa dang 'brel ba'i blangs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: byin len stobs par 'os pa dang 'brel ba'i blangs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the taking of the bowl that is fit to be given.

original: des bzung ba'i thag pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba ni 'brel pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des bzung ba'i thag pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba ni 'brel pa nyid yin no //
translated: The connection with that is the connection itself.

original: sngom pas mnyam pa lta ba tha mi dad pa dag gi sog 'jog byas pa dang byin len byas pa dang lag nyar blangs pa dag ni gcig pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: sngom pas mnyam pa lta ba tha mi dad pa dag gi sog 'jog byas pa dang byin len byas pa dang lag nyar blangs pa dag ni gcig pa nyid yin no //
translated: The rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by those who are equal in the observance of the rule and who do not differ in their views, is the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by those who are not equal in the observance of the rule and who differ in their views, is not the same.

original: mchog dang mchog ma yin par ro //
analyzed: mchog dang mchog ma yin par ro //
translated: The rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and nuns, is not the same.

original: skyes pa dang bud med dag ni phan tshun khyim pa dang 'dra'o //üîΩdge tshul dag gi la reg pa nas sbed pa'i bar la nyes par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med dag ni phan tshun khyim pa dang 'dra'o // dge tshul dag gi la reg pa nas sbed pa'i bar la nyes par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin no //

original: ltos pa dang bcas pas byin pa ni btang ba nyid ma yin no //üîΩltos pa med par btang ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid ni phyed nyid do //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pas byin pa ni btang ba nyid ma yin no // ltos pa med par btang ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid ni phyed nyid do //
translated: The rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female probationers, is not the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female novices, is not the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female lay disciples, is not the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female probationers, is not the same.

original: de'i phyir de blang bar mi bya'o //üîΩshes @37a * //üîΩbzhin du mi blang ngo //üîΩshas mnos pa dang de grub pa'i phyir reg pa ni rkyen de lta bu dag yod na rung ba ma yin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de blang bar mi bya'o // shes @37a * // bzhin du mi blang ngo // shas mnos pa dang de grub pa'i phyir reg pa ni rkyen de lta bu dag yod na rung ba ma yin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female novices, is not the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female lay disciples, is not the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female probationers, is not the same.üîΩThe rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female novices, is not the same.

original: shing rta la ni kha lo ba'i stan ma gtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: shing rta la ni kha lo ba'i stan ma gtogs pa nyid do //
translated: The rice that is stored, the rice that is given, the rice that is held in reserve by the monks and the male and female lay disciples, is not the same.üîΩThe

original: de gang la yang ngo //
analyzed: de gang la yang ngo //
translated: It is not any of those.üîΩ

original: nad pa zhon pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: nad pa zhon pa la yang ngo //
translated: It is also when one is riding on a sick person.

original: gru la ni ru skya'o //
analyzed: gru la ni ru skya'o //
translated: It is also when one is riding on a boat.

original: de 'dzin pa'i rten la yang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i rten la yang ngo //
translated: It is also when one is holding the support of a sick person.

original: dge 'dun gyi sman dag ldud pa na bskyam pa dang dbyung ba dang gzar bu'i las dang dpog pa dag la yang ngo //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi sman dag ldud pa na bskyam pa dang dbyung ba dang gzar bu'i las dang dpog pa dag la yang ngo //
translated: It is also when one is giving medicine to the Sangha, and one is engaged in the work of carrying, removing, heating, or measuring.

original: dang por shing dbri ba dang me bsad pa dang gos kyi thu ba la sogs pas rlung g-yab pas 'dab par bya'o //
analyzed: dang por shing dbri ba dang me bsad pa dang gos kyi thu ba la sogs pas rlung g-yab pas 'dab par bya'o //
translated: First, one should remove the wood, extinguish the fire, and fan with the edge of one's robe, and so on.

original: chu klung brgal ba'i phyir ram khur tsha ba brnyag pa'i phyir lag nyar blangs pa'i lam rgyags rung ste /
analyzed: chu klung brgal ba'i phyir ram khur tsha ba brnyag pa'i phyir lag nyar blangs pa'i lam rgyags rung ste /
translated: It is suitable to take provisions for the road in one's hand in order to cross a river or to carry a heavy load.

original: cho ga ma 'byor tam lam rgyags gzhan med na'o //
analyzed: cho ga ma 'byor tam lam rgyags gzhan med na'o //
translated: It is when the ritual is not available or there are no other provisions for the road.

original: khur tsha ba med na sbyin bdag spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: khur tsha ba med na sbyin bdag spro bar bya'o //
translated: If there is no heavy load, one should delight the benefactor.

original: khyer ba med na rang gis so //
analyzed: khyer ba med na rang gis so //
translated: If there is no carrier, one should do it oneself.

original: de nyid las sbyin pas brje zhing blangs ba bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las sbyin pas brje zhing blangs ba bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should obtain it by exchanging it with one's own possessions.

original: de yang ma grub na de bza' bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de yang ma grub na de bza' bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: If that is not available, one should eat it.

original: byin len stobs pa med na byin len ma byas pa de'am gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: byin len stobs pa med na byin len ma byas pa de'am gzhan yang ngo //
translated: If there is no one to receive the gift, then it is not received, or it is received by another.

original: zan bcad par byas pa'i'o //
analyzed: zan bcad par byas pa'i'o //
translated: It is when one has taken a vow of fasting.

original: nyi ma dang po la sbar gang ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma dang po la sbar gang ngo //
translated: On the first day, one may eat as much as one wishes.

original: gnyis pa la do'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la do'o //
translated: On the second day, one may eat as much as one wishes.

original: gsum pa la ni ji tsam gyis cho ga pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni ji tsam gyis cho ga pa'o //
translated: On the third day, one may eat as much as one wishes.

original: shing tog rung bar ma byas pa dang byin len ma byas pa dang lag nyar blangs pa dag kyang dus ma yin par yang bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: shing tog rung bar ma byas pa dang byin len ma byas pa dang lag nyar blangs pa dag kyang dus ma yin par yang bza' bar bya'o //
translated: One may eat fruits that are not fit to be eaten, that have not been received, or that have not been accepted, even if it is not the right time.

original: zan med pa'i'o //
analyzed: zan med pa'i'o //
translated: It is when there is no food.

original: shin tu bkres pa nyid na'o //
analyzed: shin tu bkres pa nyid na'o //
translated: It is when one is very hungry.

original: rtsa ba dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: rtsa ba dag kyang ngo //
translated: It is when one has roots.

original: rang gis kyang btog pa nyid dang dbyung ba nyid dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid byin len ma bstabs pa dang rung bar ma byas pa dang dus ma yin par za ba la sogs pa rung bar bya ba dag las rtsom 'dod pa na byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na grags pa yid la byed pa bya'o //
analyzed: rang gis kyang btog pa nyid dang dbyung ba nyid dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid byin len ma bstabs pa dang rung bar ma byas pa dang dus ma yin par za ba la sogs pa rung bar bya ba dag las rtsom 'dod pa na byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na grags pa yid la byed pa bya'o //
translated: When one wishes to begin the activities of eating what is not fit to be eaten, what has not been received, what has not been accepted, what is not the right time, and so on, one should bring to mind the practice of the people of Uttarakuru.

original: lag bsnyal ba dang 'dab ma dag yod na skyogs kyis skom mi btung ngo //
analyzed: lag bsnyal ba dang 'dab ma dag yod na skyogs kyis skom mi btung ngo //
translated: If there is a cup and leaves, one should not drink water with one‚Äôs hand.

original: med na ma bsgribs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: med na ma bsgribs par mi bya'o //
translated: If there is none, one should not drink water with one‚Äôs hand in a place where there are people.

original: de chu dang bcas pa nyid yin na kham bcad par mi gzhag go //
analyzed: de chu dang bcas pa nyid yin na kham bcad par mi gzhag go //
translated: If there is water in it, one should not put it down on the ground.

original: de'i khab ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de'i khab ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of needles:

original: shing las byas pa dang rdo las byas pa dang / sa las byas pa'o //
analyzed: shing las byas pa dang rdo las byas pa dang / sa las byas pa'o //
translated: made of wood, made of stone, and made of clay.

analyzed: skyogs gzhi shing las byas pa'am rdo las byas pa bcang bar bya'o //
translated: One should keep a needle case made of wood or stone.

original: 'dab ma dag snod nyid du spyod pa ni byin len ma byas pa nyid la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'dab ma dag snod nyid du spyod pa ni byin len ma byas pa nyid la nyes pa med do //
translated: If one uses leaves as a container, there is no offense if they have not been formally accepted.

analyzed: 'di la @37b brngas pa dang ma brngas pa dag la khyad par med do //
translated: In this case, there is no difference between what has been cut and what has not been cut.

original: gzhan med na ma brngas pa dag kyang spyad do //
analyzed: gzhan med na ma brngas pa dag kyang spyad do //
translated: If there is no other option, one may use what has not been cut.

original: sog 'jog gi ltung byed do /
analyzed: sog 'jog gi ltung byed do /

original: // / gzhan dang byin len stobs pa med na sbyin bdag gis bsam pa thag pa nas btang ba rang gis blangs te bza' bar bya'o //

analyzed: de dag gnas pa dag gis cang mi smra bas so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: The monks who are present should examine the matter and remain silent.

analyzed: snyoms par 'brim par byed pa mos par bya'o //

original: dge slong byin len byas pas brim pa nyid ni rung ba nyid yin no ;
analyzed: dge slong byin len byas pas brim pa nyid ni rung ba nyid yin no ;
translated: It is proper for a monk who has received the bowl to distribute.

original: / zhun mar dang 'bru mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pa dag 'brim na rtsva dang lo ma la sogs pa dag gis gos dag bskyab par bya'o //

analyzed: brim par bya ba gces pa dang bar ma dang tham dag so sor bya'o //

translated: The distributor should be appointed by the preceptor or the master.üîΩIf one does not obtain , one should obtain it from one who is nearby.

analyzed: du ma nyid yin na stan las ma 'phags pas ji tsam len nus pa'o //
translated: If there are many , one should take as much as one can without rising from one‚Äôs seat.

analyzed: 'dril pa ni rang gi gnas nas ma 'phags pas len nus pa nyid yin na byin len ma zhig go ;

analyzed: / sbrang bu dang grog sdur la sogs pa dag gis reg pa yang ngo //
translated: If it is touched by insects, ants, and so forth, it is called ‚Äúto be received by a swarm.‚Äù

analyzed: dge slong gis ma btang ba la gzhan gyis kyang ngo //

original: byi bas ni zhig par byed do //

analyzed: de yang srog chags kyi khams lhag par mang ba'i chu lta bu yang sbyor ba dag yin no //

original: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o /üîΩ// / dpyad tshags bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o /üîΩ// / dpyad tshags bcang bar bya'o //

original: bzed snod kyi steng gi nam mkha' la bzhag par bya zhing dgang ba dang btsag par bya ba'i chu bzed par byed pa'i tshags gdags bya ba'i phyir lcags gzer dag btab pa'i shing bu gsum dang ldan pa ni de zhes bya'o //

translated: It is placed in the air above the bowl, and it is called ‚Äúthe three sticks‚Äù because they are fastened with iron nails in order to support the water-strainer and the water-pot.

analyzed: chu gnas par bya ba'i phyir chu tshags su gcal gzhug par bya'o //

original: bye ma 'am lci ba'o //

original: yang na tshags rten snod do //
analyzed: yang na tshags rten snod do //

original: sa dang zangs ma las byas pa'i gang yang rung ngo //
analyzed: sa dang zangs ma las byas pa'i gang yang rung ngo //

original: de ni shing bu gsum gyi thog ma la gdags so //
analyzed: de ni shing bu gsum gyi thog ma la gdags so //

original: bu gur lung byas te'o //
analyzed: bu gur lung byas te'o //

analyzed: de ni ngos gnyis na btags na yang 'dug tu btub bo //

original: phyi rol gyi ngos su tshags rten snod gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ngos su tshags rten snod gzhag par bya'o //

original: snga ma ni tha gus so //
analyzed: snga ma ni tha gus so //

original: phyi ma ni lcags thag 'jam pos so //
analyzed: phyi ma ni lcags thag 'jam pos so //
translated: The latter is with a soft iron chain.

original: de bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bcang bar bya'o //
translated: It should be kept.

original: chu mi 'dzag na shing leb kyis chu tshags la dal bu dal bus gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: chu mi 'dzag na shing leb kyis chu tshags la dal bu dal bus gdab par bya'o //
translated: If the water does not leak, he should slowly and gradually fill the water strainer with the wooden board.

original: bum tshags gce'u can ni tshegs chung ngo //
analyzed: bum tshags gce'u can ni tshegs chung ngo //
translated: The water strainer with a spout is less troublesome.

original: de bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bcang bar bya'o //
translated: He should carry it.

original: sa 'am zangs ma las byas pa'o //
analyzed: sa 'am zangs ma las byas pa'o //
translated: It is made of clay or copper.

original: de ni bum pa'i dbyibs can nang padma'i bu gu lta bu dang ldan pa'i sbubs can yin no //
analyzed: de ni bum pa'i dbyibs can nang padma'i bu gu lta bu dang ldan pa'i sbubs can yin no //
translated: It has the shape of a water pot, with an opening like a lotus flower inside.

original: de dag tu ras mas dgab pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dag tu ras mas dgab pa nyid do //
translated: It is covered with cloth.

original: chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
