original: chu tshags gru gsum mam /
analyzed: chu tshags gru gsum mam /
translated: The water strainer is triangular,üîΩwith a rim,

original: ril ba zhabs tshags can nam /üîΩbsal tshags kyang ngo //
analyzed: ril ba zhabs tshags can nam / bsal tshags kyang ngo //
translated: or with a strainer.

original: bya ma bum dang ril bdag gis chu rung ba bcus pa nyid dang yod pa nyid kyang de dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: bya ma bum dang ril bdag gis chu rung ba bcus pa nyid dang yod pa nyid kyang de dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: The water pot and the water strainer are suitable for carrying water. He should have them.

original: de med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not go wandering in the country without them.

original: nang dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu mi bya'o //
analyzed: nang dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu mi bya'o //
translated: He should not go with them inside or together with them.

original: gal te rkyen de lta bu yod na bzod pa gsol te'o //
analyzed: gal te rkyen de lta bu yod na bzod pa gsol te'o //
translated: If such conditions exist, he should ask for forgiveness.

original: bya ba byed pa ni yod pa nyid ni yod pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba byed pa ni yod pa nyid ni yod pa yin no //
translated: The activity of the agent is the existence of the existent.

original: gzhan gyis 'di ltar der de sbyin no zhas khas blangs pa ni de dang ldan @39a * //üîΩpa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis 'di ltar der de sbyin no zhas khas blangs pa ni de dang ldan @39a * // pa nyid yin no //
translated: The promise to give to another is the possession of that.

original: ljongs rgyu ba'i tshe 'bral na sbyin par khas ma blangs na de la brten par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ljongs rgyu ba'i tshe 'bral na sbyin par khas ma blangs na de la brten par mi bya'o //
translated: If one does not promise to give when one is separated from the other by a journey, one is not bound to give.

original: phongs bar mi 'gyur ba'i nye 'khor du 'gro ba ni rgyu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phongs bar mi 'gyur ba'i nye 'khor du 'gro ba ni rgyu ba ma yin no //
translated: One does not go to a place where one is not bound to go.

original: de ni rgyang grags lnga nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgyang grags lnga nyid yin no //
translated: The distance is five kro≈õas.

original: gnas su bzhag ste song ba de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa ni rang dgar byed pa ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas su bzhag ste song ba de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa ni rang dgar byed pa ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: One is not bound to give if one has left the object in a place, but one is bound if one has left it in a place with the intention of giving it.

original: gcig gis dge 'dun man chad du ma de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig gis dge 'dun man chad du ma de dang ldan pa nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One is not bound to give if one has given to one person, and so on up to: the Sa·πÖgha.üîΩOne is not bound to give if one is not able to give.üîΩOne is bound to give if one is able to give.

original: rgyun mgyogs pa la ni phongs par mi 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyun mgyogs pa la ni phongs par mi 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: One is not bound to give if one is going in the direction of the river.

original: de la rgyun phyogs su rjes su 'grel bar 'gro bas ni des rgyang grags kyi bar du 'jug tu rung ngo //
analyzed: de la rgyun phyogs su rjes su 'grel bar 'gro bas ni des rgyang grags kyi bar du 'jug tu rung ngo //
translated: One is bound to give if one is going in the opposite direction.

original: gal te de chu gzhan dang 'dres par gyur na de yan chad du'o //
analyzed: gal te de chu gzhan dang 'dres par gyur na de yan chad du'o //
translated: If it mixes with other water, then beyond that.

original: brtags pa nas 'dom gang khor yug ni de nyid yin no //
analyzed: brtags pa nas 'dom gang khor yug ni de nyid yin no //
translated: From the examination, a fathom all around is just that.

original: mig gi dag pa nyid kyi chu ni dag pa yin no //
analyzed: mig gi dag pa nyid kyi chu ni dag pa yin no //
translated: The water of the purity of the eye is pure.

original: tha mal pas so //
analyzed: tha mal pas so //
translated: By the ordinary.

original: mi g-yo ba nyid dang rnyog pa med pa la brtag par bya'o//
analyzed: mi g-yo ba nyid dang rnyog pa med pa la brtag par bya'o//
translated: The immovability and non-turbidity should be examined.

original: bum pa gang yin pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: bum pa gang yin pa nyid la'o //
translated: In the very vase.

original: de la bya ba las 'das par bgrang ba'i yun ring po nyid du mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la bya ba las 'das par bgrang ba'i yun ring po nyid du mi bya'o //
translated: There, the long duration of counting beyond the action should not be done.

original: rtse mo 'jam pos srog chags dag bstan sla'o //
analyzed: rtse mo 'jam pos srog chags dag bstan sla'o //
translated: With a soft tip, it is easy to show the beings.

original: de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam du mi dor ro //
analyzed: de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam du mi dor ro //
translated: They should not be thrown on the path of death.

original: gzhan yang mi dor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi dor ro //
translated: They should not be thrown elsewhere.

original: gal te mar me'i nang du srog chags ltung na de byed pas de g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mar me'i nang du srog chags ltung na de byed pas de g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: If a being falls into the lamp, the doer should cover it.

original: smyig tshal gyi gzeb dar dkar ram lhang tsher srab mos g-yogs pa ni de zhes bya'o //
analyzed: smyig tshal gyi gzeb dar dkar ram lhang tsher srab mos g-yogs pa ni de zhes bya'o //
translated: A cage of bamboo covered with white silk or thin cotton is called that.

original: mig brgya pa yang rung ngo //
analyzed: mig brgya pa yang rung ngo //
translated: Or a hundred eyes.

original: dang po nas byas pa'am bum pa la sogs pa'i snod bu gu can no //
analyzed: dang po nas byas pa'am bum pa la sogs pa'i snod bu gu can no //
translated: If it is a new one, or if it is a pot or some other container, it should be turned upside down.

original: skra'i rnyis sbrul gzung ba mi bya'o /
analyzed: skra'i rnyis sbrul gzung ba mi bya'o /
translated: One should not pick up a snake with one‚Äôs hand.

original: se gol gyi sgra phyung ste bzhin pa zangs mig lam na ma 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: se gol gyi sgra phyung ste bzhin pa zangs mig lam na ma 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should snap one‚Äôs fingers and say, ‚ÄòGo away, copper-eyed one! Do not stay in the path!‚Äô

original: mi 'gro na dbyu gu skam khas dal bus rdza ma'am dum par bcug ste kha bcad nas bu gu dag btod de bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'gro na dbyu gu skam khas dal bus rdza ma'am dum par bcug ste kha bcad nas bu gu dag btod de bsal bar bya'o //
translated: If it does not go away, one should slowly insert a dry stick into the hole of the pot or the hole of the container, block the opening, and remove the stick.

original: ma grub na lcag pod dam shur bu phre'us sam tha gu ras mas dkris pa'i zhag mig gis mgul bar bcings te dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub na lcag pod dam shur bu phre'us sam tha gu ras mas dkris pa'i zhag mig gis mgul bar bcings te dor bar bya'o //
translated: If that does not work, one should tie a stick or a piece of bamboo to a rope or a piece of cloth, insert it into the hole, and remove the insect.

original: de dag ni gzhug pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de dag ni gzhug pa la yang ngo //
translated: This also applies to what is to be inserted.

original: tshang tshing gi nang du dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: tshang tshing gi nang du dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not throw it into a thicket.

original: khung du zhugs kyi bar du bsad par bya'o //
analyzed: khung du zhugs kyi bar du bsad par bya'o //
translated: One should kill it up to the entrance to a hole.

original: shig rnams ni ras mar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: shig rnams ni ras mar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: As for lice, one should put them into a piece of cloth.

original: de ni gseb dag tu'o //
analyzed: de ni gseb dag tu'o //
translated: This is for what is in the body.

original: rtsva shig rnams ni gsing mar ro //
analyzed: rtsva shig rnams ni gsing mar ro //
translated: As for grass and lice, one should put them on the ground.

original: yang @39b na phyogs bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang @39b na phyogs bsal bar bya'o //
translated: Or one should remove them to another place.

original: snga ma gzhug pa'i phyir bsal snod bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma gzhug pa'i phyir bsal snod bcang bar bya'o //
translated: In order to fill it again, one should keep a vessel for water.

original: yang na chu tshags de nyid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na chu tshags de nyid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Or one should fill it with that very water-strainer.

original: chu tshags la srog chags chags pa bsal ba'i thabs ni bshal ba yin no //
analyzed: chu tshags la srog chags chags pa bsal ba'i thabs ni bshal ba yin no //
translated: The method of removing living beings that have been caught in the water-strainer is to wash it.

original: dri ma ni bkru ba'o //
analyzed: dri ma ni bkru ba'o //
translated: The method of removing dirt is to wash it.

original: rul ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni skam pa'o //
analyzed: rul ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni skam pa'o //
translated: The method of preventing it from rotting is to dry it.

original: de gnyis ka la yang dam du btsir na phan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de gnyis ka la yang dam du btsir na phan pa nyid do //
translated: In both cases, it is beneficial to press it firmly.

original: dge 'dun dang gang zag dang chu tshags dang chu tshags ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa la kha na ma tho ba med do //
analyzed: dge 'dun dang gang zag dang chu tshags dang chu tshags ma rnyed pa'i shes pas 'jug pa la kha na ma tho ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one enters with the knowledge that the Sa·πÖgha, an individual, or the water-strainer, or the water, is not available.

original: bcus pa dang khron pa dag pa ni nyi ma 'char kha tshun chad brtags pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: bcus pa dang khron pa dag pa ni nyi ma 'char kha tshun chad brtags pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug go //
translated: A well or a spring that is pure is to be used as long as the sun is up.

original: rkang khrus snod stong par mthong na dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rkang khrus snod stong par mthong na dgang bar bya'o //
translated: If one sees that the foot-washing water is empty, one should fill it.

original: chu dang gzhan gyi snod kyang nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: chu dang gzhan gyi snod kyang nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should also place water and a vessel for others.

original: dge 'dun gyi der gtogs pa ni snod spyad 'brub pa'i las yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi der gtogs pa ni snod spyad 'brub pa'i las yin no //
translated: The Sa·πÖgha‚Äôs belongs to the Sa·πÖgha.

original: 'dir sbyin pa dang blang ba dag kyang ma bsdus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir sbyin pa dang blang ba dag kyang ma bsdus pa ma yin no //
translated: But this does not mean that the gift and the receiver are not included here.

original: khyim pa rnying pa rmya ba nyid la de yod pa nyid na sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pa rnying pa rmya ba nyid la de yod pa nyid na sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If an old and worn-out householder has it, he should give it.

original: des gtsug lag khang du yon bdag rnams la sbyin par bya ba nyid kyang ma bstan pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des gtsug lag khang du yon bdag rnams la sbyin par bya ba nyid kyang ma bstan pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: This does not mean that he should not give it to the donors in the monastery.

original: dge slong la ni sar pa phyir blang ba med pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: dge slong la ni sar pa phyir blang ba med pa nyid du'o //
translated: But the monk should not take back the new one.

original: snod spyad kyi ched du mdzod khang bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: snod spyad kyi ched du mdzod khang bsko bar bya'o //
translated: A storehouse should be assigned for the sake of the utensils.

original: sa dang zangs ma'i snod spyad dag so sor gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: sa dang zangs ma'i snod spyad dag so sor gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The earthen and copper utensils should be placed separately.

original: chu nye bar gzhag par bya'o ;
analyzed: chu nye bar gzhag par bya'o ;
translated: Water should be placed nearby.

original: / gar bab bab tu mi gzhag go //
analyzed: / gar bab bab tu mi gzhag go //
translated: It should not be placed haphazardly.

original: de'i ched du khang bu bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ched du khang bu bya'o //
translated: For that purpose, a room should be made.

original: gtsug lag khang gi nang gi lho nub kyi mtshams su'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi nang gi lho nub kyi mtshams su'o //
translated: In the southwest corner of the monastery.

original: skar khung gdod pa dang / so phag gi gcal dgram pa dang / chu khung gdod pa dang / sgo gdod pa dang / sgo glegs dang / lag zungs dang yang mi gzug par bya'o //
analyzed: skar khung gdod pa dang / so phag gi gcal dgram pa dang / chu khung gdod pa dang / sgo gdod pa dang / sgo glegs dang / lag zungs dang yang mi gzug par bya'o //
translated: He should open the windows, lay out the brick pavement, dig the water-trough, open the door, and put up the bolt and the bar.

original: chu tshags gzhag pa'i phyir gdang bu bya'o //
analyzed: chu tshags gzhag pa'i phyir gdang bu bya'o //
translated: He should put up a rack for the water-strainers.

original: shing gi khri'u dag la gzhag go //
analyzed: shing gi khri'u dag la gzhag go //
translated: He should put them on wooden stands.

original: yang na so phag gi stegs bu'i steng du'o //
analyzed: yang na so phag gi stegs bu'i steng du'o //
translated: Or on a brick-pavement.

original: gzhi dag la'o //
analyzed: gzhi dag la'o //
translated: Or on the ground.

original: chu snod ni khrus chu'i ched kyi bar yan chad kyang gtsang sbra bya'o //üîΩgtsang bar bya'o //üîΩgtsang bar bya'i //üîΩbtung bar bya ba'i //
analyzed: chu snod ni khrus chu'i ched kyi bar yan chad kyang gtsang sbra bya'o // gtsang bar bya'o // gtsang bar bya'i // btung bar bya ba'i //
translated: He should keep the water-pots clean, up to the water for washing after defecation.üîΩHe should keep the water for washing clean.üîΩHe should keep the water for drinking clean.

original: chu yang ngo ;
analyzed: chu yang ngo ;
translated: He should keep the water for the mouth clean.

original: / de lag pa dang gos rung ba ma yin pa dag gis brim par mi bya'o //
analyzed: / de lag pa dang gos rung ba ma yin pa dag gis brim par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not carry the water for drinking in his hand or in his robe.

original: chu snod rnams kyi nang du dus dus su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu snod rnams kyi nang du dus dus su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: He should wash the water-strainers from time to time.

original: zab mo rnams ni pu shel tsi'i khru dang shing ngam 'dab ma'i chang bu 'am ras ma shing bu'i rtse mo la btags pas so //
analyzed: zab mo rnams ni pu shel tsi'i khru dang shing ngam 'dab ma'i chang bu 'am ras ma shing bu'i rtse mo la btags pas so //
translated: The deep ones with a bamboo-tube, a wooden tube, a leaf-tube, or a cloth-tube tied to the end of a stick.

analyzed: de la zas kyi 'gram gzer @40a * //
