analyzed: mi nus pa khrid pa yang ngo // bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is to travel with a woman on a road where one can be seen.üîΩThe downfall is to travel with a woman on a road where one can be seen.üîΩThe downfall is to travel with a woman on a road where one can be seen.üîΩThe downfall is to travel with a woman on a road where one can be seen.

original: // / grong 'joms par byed pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam sho gam 'dral bar byed pa'i tshong ba dag dang lhan cig 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: // / grong 'joms par byed pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam sho gam 'dral bar byed pa'i tshong ba dag dang lhan cig 'gro ba la'o //
translated: The downfall is to travel with a woman on a road where one can be seen.

original: zol pa dag dang rku thabs su rab tu byung ba dang lhan cig 'gro ba la ni nyes byas so ;
analyzed: zol pa dag dang rku thabs su rab tu byung ba dang lhan cig 'gro ba la ni nyes byas so ;
translated: There is an offense of wrong conduct for going with those who have gone forth through hypocrisy or by theft.

original: / rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: / rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: This is the downfall of going with a thief.

original: // / shes gtso'o //
analyzed: // / shes gtso'o //
translated: The downfall of not knowing the Vinaya.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba lo nyi shu ma lon pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba lo nyi shu ma lon pa nyid la'o //
translated: The subject is a person who has not completed twenty years.

original: mkhan po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mkhan po nyid kyis so //
translated: The basis is the preceptor.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na'o //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na'o //
translated: The action is to give full ordination to that person.

original: des de la lon pa nyid mi dri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: des de la lon pa nyid mi dri bar mi bya'o //
translated: The person must not be asked if he has completed twenty years.

original: gzhan gyis kyang mi bya'o ;
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang mi bya'o ;
translated: Others also must not ask.

original: / nges par mi shes par de bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: / nges par mi shes par de bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o //
translated: One must not give full ordination to that person without knowing for certain.üîΩIf he has completed twenty years, full ordination is allowed.

original: rnam pa thams cad du de lo nyi shu lon pa la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'chags so //üîΩcig shos la ni lon par 'du shes pa nyid na'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du de lo nyi shu lon pa la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'chags so // cig shos la ni lon par 'du shes pa nyid na'o //
translated: If he has not completed twenty years, it is allowed if he thinks he has.

original: mi shes pa dang mi dran pa dang yid gnyis za ba dag la yang ngo //
analyzed: mi shes pa dang mi dran pa dang yid gnyis za ba dag la yang ngo //
translated: It is also allowed if he does not know, does not remember, or is unsure.

original: shes na ni de zhig go //
analyzed: shes na ni de zhig go //
translated: If he knows, it is not allowed.

original: gal te de skyes pa na ma lon pa'i'o //
analyzed: gal te de skyes pa na ma lon pa'i'o //
translated: If he has completed twenty years, it is not allowed if he thinks he has not.

original: mngal na gnas pa dang shol gyi zla ba dag rang yang bcas te'o //
analyzed: mngal na gnas pa dang shol gyi zla ba dag rang yang bcas te'o //
translated: The period of pregnancy and the period of the intercalary month are added to the natural period.

original: ma lon pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: ma lon pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: If one gives the upasampada ordination to a person who has not completed one year, this is a sth≈´lƒÅtyaya offense.üîΩTo dig or to have it dug.

original: // / rko ba'am rkor bcug pa la'o //
analyzed: // / rko ba'am rkor bcug pa la'o //
translated: Of the earth.

original: sa'i'o // lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed ba med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'jugs pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: sa'i'o // lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed ba med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'jugs pa ma gtogs so //
translated: If one does not make it suitable by means of the calculation of the nak·π£atras, one should not dig more than four fingerbreadths with one‚Äôs hand.

original: gal te rang bzhin can yin na dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin can yin na dngos gzhi'o //
translated: If the person is naturally slow, it is a sth≈´lƒÅtyaya offense.

original: gal te ma yin na nyes byas / so //
analyzed: gal te ma yin na nyes byas / so //
translated: If the person is not naturally slow, it is a light infringement of the rules.

original: snga ma shos pa ni zla ba gsum lon pa'i 'thas pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma shos pa ni zla ba gsum lon pa'i 'thas pa'o //
translated: The first part is the three months of the rainy season.

original: gal te char chu zhod na'o //
analyzed: gal te char chu zhod na'o //
translated: If it rains during that time.

original: gzhan gyi tshe na drug go //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe na drug go //
translated: If it is another time, it is six months.

original: rtsig pa ni sa nyid ma yin bar shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rtsig pa ni sa nyid ma yin bar shes par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not think that the wall is not the earth.

original: 'dus pa dag la ni shas che bas mtshan nyid dag rab tu dbye ba nyin yin no //
analyzed: 'dus pa dag la ni shas che bas mtshan nyid dag rab tu dbye ba nyin yin no //
translated: In the case of a gathering, the characteristics are distinguished by the majority.

original: de'i phyir nyung du gzhan yod pa'i rdzas nyid la ni phal che ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyung du gzhan yod pa'i rdzas nyid la ni phal che ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, in a substance where there are few others, there is a majority.

original: tshig pa nyid ni nyams pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: tshig pa nyid ni nyams pa nyid yin no //
translated: Being burned is the same as being destroyed.

original: nyams pa nyid la ni phyed nyid do //
analyzed: nyams pa nyid la ni phyed nyid do //
translated: But if it is damaged, it is half.üîΩThe earth, the bank, the wall,üîΩand the plaster of the wall,

original: dus las yol du byed na brims shig ces bsgo ba yang ngo //
analyzed: dus las yol du byed na brims shig ces bsgo ba yang ngo //
translated: If you are able to do so, then eat.

original: tshig 'bru de nyid ma yin pa la gus par mi bya'o //
analyzed: tshig 'bru de nyid ma yin pa la gus par mi bya'o //
translated: Do not respect the words of those who are not the Buddha.

original: so sor mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o //
analyzed: so sor mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o //
translated: You should accept the invitation of each individual.

original: dge 'dun dang bcas te mgron du bos pa yang ngo ;
analyzed: dge 'dun dang bcas te mgron du bos pa yang ngo ;
translated: You should also accept the invitation of the Sangha.

original: / dus thams cad du yang ngo //
analyzed: / dus thams cad du yang ngo //
translated: You should accept the invitation at all times.

original: tshig rnam par gzhag pa med par mgron du gnyer ba dang ldan pa las phyis gzhan nam yang dang yang du'am dus kyis mgron du gnyer ba ma byas par zla ba bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu bshams pa zos na'o //
analyzed: tshig rnam par gzhag pa med par mgron du gnyer ba dang ldan pa las phyis gzhan nam yang dang yang du'am dus kyis mgron du gnyer ba ma byas par zla ba bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu bshams pa zos na'o //
translated: If you eat the food prepared after the fourth month without having previously accepted an invitation to eat at a certain time, or again and again, or for a long time, or without any specification, then you have committed an offense.

original: rnam par rig byed la ni nyes byas so //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed la ni nyes byas so //
translated: If you do it with a physical act, you have committed an offense of wrong conduct.

original: nad pa la ni ltung ba med do //üîΩnye du las kyang ngo //
analyzed: nad pa la ni ltung ba med do // nye du las kyang ngo //
translated: There is no offense if you are sick.üîΩThere is no offense if the food is from a relative.üîΩThere is no offense if you are wandering in the wilderness.

original: rnam par 'khyams pa las snga ma ni tha dad pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par 'khyams pa las snga ma ni tha dad pa nyid do //
translated: The first is a separate rule.

original: de ni ma bstabs pa'i nyes pa byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma bstabs pa'i nyes pa byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: This is the rule for those who commit offenses without being invited.

original: mdun rol du yang gang gis ma bstabs pa'o //
analyzed: mdun rol du yang gang gis ma bstabs pa'o //
translated: There is no offense if you are not invited to eat in front of someone.

original: mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa'i ltung byed do /üîΩ// / shes gtso'o //üîΩmngon par shes pa nyid la'o //üîΩsmra ba po la'o //üîΩbslab pa la'o //
analyzed: mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa'i ltung byed do / // / shes gtso'o // mngon par shes pa nyid la'o // smra ba po la'o // bslab pa la'o //
translated: It is a fall for a monk to stay away from his host for more than a day and a night.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.

original: dge slong gis khyod kyis 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes brjod pa na'am bsgo ba ni mi slob bo zhes rgyu'i dngos po des go bar byed pa la mi shes pa nyid sgrogs par byed pa'i tshig brjod na'o //üîΩmdo sde las gsungs pa la ni nyes byas kyi'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis khyod kyis 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes brjod pa na'am bsgo ba ni mi slob bo zhes rgyu'i dngos po des go bar byed pa la mi shes pa nyid sgrogs par byed pa'i tshig brjod na'o // mdo sde las gsungs pa la ni nyes byas kyi'o //
translated: It is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.

original: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spang ba'i ltung byed do /üîΩ// / dge slong dag rtsod par gyur pa dge slong dag dang gros byed pa na mnyan pa'i phyir rna gtod na ste nye bar zhi bar 'dod pas ni ma gtogs @46b so ;
analyzed: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spang ba'i ltung byed do / // / dge slong dag rtsod par gyur pa dge slong dag dang gros byed pa na mnyan pa'i phyir rna gtod na ste nye bar zhi bar 'dod pas ni ma gtogs @46b so ;
translated: It is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.

original: / sgra thos pa la ni nyes byas so //üîΩdon la ni dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: / sgra thos pa la ni nyes byas so // don la ni dngos gzhi'o //
translated: It is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.

original: gal te 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol bas so //
analyzed: gal te 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol bas so //
translated: It is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.üîΩIt is a fall for a monk to not teach the Dharma to a layperson who is eager to learn it.

original: don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son zhing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang se gol dang lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed na nges par ltung ba 'byin pa nyid du 'gyur te ;
analyzed: don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son zhing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang se gol dang lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed na nges par ltung ba 'byin pa nyid du 'gyur te ;
translated: If, after having gone and understood the meaning by the power of another, one does not make it understood by the sound of foot, finger snap, or cough, one will certainly commit a downfall.

original: gal te nor ba dang zhe bar 'dod pa ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: gal te nor ba dang zhe bar 'dod pa ni ma gtogs so //
translated: Except for the case of error or if one is sick.

original: 'thab gcugs mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'thab gcugs mi bya'o //
translated: One should not quarrel.

original: mnyan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mnyan par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not listen.

original: de byed pa la nye bar bskor te 'dug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de byed pa la nye bar bskor te 'dug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sit in a circle with those who do it.

original: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi 'bad par mi 'bar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi 'bad par mi 'bar bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not remain without making an effort to pacify it.

original: nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed do ;
analyzed: nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed do ;
translated: This is the downfall through listening.

original: // / gsol ba la sogs pa'i las la 'dus pa dge slong dge la ma smras par 'gro na'o //üîΩthos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: // / gsol ba la sogs pa'i las la 'dus pa dge slong dge la ma smras par 'gro na'o // thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na dngos gzhi'o //
translated: The basis is a gathering of monks in a legal procedure such as a confession.

original: mdun rol du ni nyes byas so //
analyzed: mdun rol du ni nyes byas so //
translated: The actual downfall is to go beyond the vicinity of the hearing of the procedure.üîΩThe proximate cause is to go beyond the range of sight.

original: don med pa dang mi rigs pas 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: don med pa dang mi rigs pas 'gro ba'o //
translated: The completion is to go without a reason or in an improper way.

original: gsol ba byas pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: gsol ba byas pa nyid la'o //
translated: The downfall is accrued by the one who has made the announcement.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i don nyid ma yin pa'i las la yang ngo //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i don nyid ma yin pa'i las la yang ngo //
translated: It is also when the action is not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: thos pa'i yul las mi 'da' bar 'dod pas ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: thos pa'i yul las mi 'da' bar 'dod pas ni ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one does not want to transgress the domain of what is heard.

original: mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is not to speak when one should.

original: // /'dug pa dang 'gro ba dang gnas mal dang gtsug lag khang len pa dang smra ba la sogs pa bsgo ba'i don la ma gus pas chos dang ldan par bshad kyis sbyang ba med par de las bzlog ste 'gal bar byed pa la'o //
analyzed: // /'dug pa dang 'gro ba dang gnas mal dang gtsug lag khang len pa dang smra ba la sogs pa bsgo ba'i don la ma gus pas chos dang ldan par bshad kyis sbyang ba med par de las bzlog ste 'gal bar byed pa la'o //
translated: The downfall is to act in a way that contradicts the instruction, without having trained in it, out of disrespect for the meaning of the instruction, which is in accordance with the Dharma, whether it concerns sitting, walking, sleeping, the temple, speaking, and so forth.

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi la ni dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi la ni dngos gzhi'o //
translated: The downfall is a serious violation in the case of the community of fully ordained monks.

original: mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gi la ni nyes byas so //
analyzed: mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gi la ni nyes byas so //
translated: It is a minor offense in the case of the preceptor or the master.

original: chos dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa'i bsgo ba las kyang ngo //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa'i bsgo ba las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also when the instruction is not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: gtam zer pa ni de nyid do //
analyzed: gtam zer pa ni de nyid do //
translated: The same applies to the term ‚Äúconversation.‚Äù

original: dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pa ni de'i kha yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pa ni de'i kha yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúthe community‚Äù refers to the assembly.

original: sangs rgyas ni dge 'dun dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni dge 'dun dang 'dra'o //
translated: The Buddha is like the community.

original: rgyal po dang dgra bcom pa dang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan rnams kyi tshig rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal po dang dgra bcom pa dang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan rnams kyi tshig rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not confuse the words of the king, of the Arhats, and of the elders of the community.

original: ma gus pa'i tshul gyis ltung byed do /
analyzed: ma gus pa'i tshul gyis ltung byed do /
translated: If one does so out of disrespect, one is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta.

original: // / myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba na'o //üîΩde bskol na ni de nyid las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: // / myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba na'o // de bskol na ni de nyid las nyams pa yin no //
translated: One is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta when one drinks an intoxicating beverage.

original: spang ma dang tshigs ma zab la ni de'i 'jug pa yod do //
analyzed: spang ma dang tshigs ma zab la ni de'i 'jug pa yod do //
translated: If one drinks a beverage that becomes intoxicating, one is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta.üîΩIf one drinks a beverage that is not intoxicating when it is fresh, but becomes so when it ferments, one is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta.

original: phabs kyi chang bu ni phyed nyid do //
analyzed: phabs kyi chang bu ni phyed nyid do //
translated: If one drinks a beverage that is half intoxicating, one is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta.

original: rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu myos par 'gyur ba rnams kyang ngo //üîΩmyos par 'gyur pa'i dri @47a * //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu myos par 'gyur ba rnams kyang ngo // myos par 'gyur pa'i dri @47a * //
translated: One is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta when one drinks a beverage made from roots, stalks, leaves, flowers, or fruits that are intoxicating.

original: dang ro bro ba'i thug pa myos par mi byed pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: dang ro bro ba'i thug pa myos par mi byed pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: One is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta when one drinks a beverage that has an intoxicating smell or taste, even if it is not intoxicating.

original: mdog tsam myos par 'gyur ba dang 'dra ba la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: mdog tsam myos par 'gyur ba dang 'dra ba la ni nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the beverage is merely the color of an intoxicating beverage.

original: mkhur bar bsel ba dang lus skud pa ni sbyor ba dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mkhur bar bsel ba dang lus skud pa ni sbyor ba dang 'dra'o //
translated: One is guilty of a Dfirmasadhasta if one sucks the beverage through one‚Äôs cheek or if one drinks it by sprinkling it on one‚Äôs body, as if one were bathing.

original: nad pa la ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: nad pa la ni ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is ill.

analyzed: bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po la khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed do /

analyzed: // / pa so dang rus pa dang rva'i khab ral byed dam byed du bcug pa la'o //

analyzed: byas zin pa rnyed pa dang byas zin pa la spyod pa dag la ni ltung ba med do //

translated: unless it is a cosmetic or something that is not given;

original: de la dge slong gang yang rung ba lhan cig mi za bas kyang rung bas sring mo khyod dge slong rnams zan zos kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig ces ma bsgo bar dge slong gsum la sogs pa mgron du bos pas zos na'o //
analyzed: de la dge slong gang yang rung ba lhan cig mi za bas kyang rung bas sring mo khyod dge slong rnams zan zos kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig ces ma bsgo bar dge slong gsum la sogs pa mgron du bos pas zos na'o //
translated: if she does not ask a monk who is not a relative to set aside food, drink, rice porridge, or fresh food, saying, ‚ÄúPlease set this aside for me,‚Äù even if it is not to be eaten together;

original: khyim du'o // gal te tshig de nye bar gdags su rung na dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: khyim du'o // gal te tshig de nye bar gdags su rung na dngos gzhi'o //
translated: If the words can be spoken, then it is the actual basis.

original: @48b gal te mi rung na nyes byas kyi'o //
analyzed: @48b gal te mi rung na nyes byas kyi'o //
translated: If they cannot be spoken, then it is a minor offense.

original: 'di la bsgo ba nyid du rnam par gnas pa ni shes gtso'o //
analyzed: 'di la bsgo ba nyid du rnam par gnas pa ni shes gtso'o //
translated: Here, the one who is to be told is the most important.

original: de'i phyir dri ba la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dri ba la brtson par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should strive to ask.

original: 'di la rgan pa mi 'jug na gsar bus 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la rgan pa mi 'jug na gsar bus 'jug par bya'o //
translated: If the elders do not engage in this, then the novices should engage in it.

original: gral rims su ma phebs par 'brim du 'jug pa ma bzlog par za ba'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: gral rims su ma phebs par 'brim du 'jug pa ma bzlog par za ba'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste gnyis pa'o /
translated: The second confession is for those who eat without stopping the distribution of food that has not been properly distributed in the order of seniority.

original: // / dad pa can la gal te byin na de phongs par 'gyur ba lta na khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: // / dad pa can la gal te byin na de phongs par 'gyur ba lta na khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If it is seen that giving to the faithful will cause them to suffer, then the lay precepts should be given.

original: gsol bas so //
analyzed: gsol bas so //
translated: By request.

original: bag yangs su bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: bag yangs su bya ba yang ngo //
translated: And also for those who are relaxed.

original: byin pa de'i sems rtogs nas khyim du 'gro ba dang stan la 'dug pa dang chos bstan pa dag bya'o //
analyzed: byin pa de'i sems rtogs nas khyim du 'gro ba dang stan la 'dug pa dang chos bstan pa dag bya'o //
translated: Having understood the mind of that giver, one should go to the house, sit on the seat, and teach the Dharma.

original: ltung bzed stong pas 'jug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ltung bzed stong pas 'jug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not enter with an empty alms-bowl.

original: de'i byis pa slong ba dag la bsod snyoms las snum khor sbyin par bya zhing ril gyis ni mi sbyin no //
analyzed: de'i byis pa slong ba dag la bsod snyoms las snum khor sbyin par bya zhing ril gyis ni mi sbyin no //
translated: He should give the children who beg from him some oil from his begging bowl, but not all of it.

original: 'dod na bag yangs su bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod na bag yangs su bya'o //
translated: If he wishes, he may relax this rule.

original: de yin pa'i mdun rol du mgron du ma bos pas bslab pa'i sdom pa byin pa'i khyim nas bza' ba dang bca' ba dag blangs shing zos pa la ste /
analyzed: de yin pa'i mdun rol du mgron du ma bos pas bslab pa'i sdom pa byin pa'i khyim nas bza' ba dang bca' ba dag blangs shing zos pa la ste /
translated: This refers to the case where a monk who has not been invited to a meal takes and eats food in the house of someone who has given him a vow of training.

original: ga gon dang la phug dang ldam ldum mod pa dag ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ga gon dang la phug dang ldam ldum mod pa dag ni ma gtogs so //
translated: This does not apply to the case where the food is a small amount of vegetables, radish, or turnip.

original: bslab pa dral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor bshags pa bya ba ste gsum pa'o /
analyzed: bslab pa dral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor bshags pa bya ba ste gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the third rule entailing acknowledgment that is confessed separately.

original: // / nags nyul ba'i dge slong bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / nags nyul ba'i dge slong bskor bar bya'o //
translated: A monk who is wandering in the forest should be accompanied.

original: des dpag tshad phyed kho ra khor yug tu brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: des dpag tshad phyed kho ra khor yug tu brtag par bya'o //
translated: He should investigate the area within a half-league in all directions.

original: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na dung brda brtul bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na dung brda brtul bar bya'o //
translated: If there is danger, he should sound a conch shell.

original: ba dan sngon po bsgreng bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba dan sngon po bsgreng bar bya'o //
translated: He should raise a blue flag.

original: 'dab ma'i chang bu dag lam khar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma'i chang bu dag lam khar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should place a sign on the path.

original: gzhan du na dkar po dag go //
analyzed: gzhan du na dkar po dag go //
translated: Otherwise, it should be white.

original: 'dod pa nyid yin na de la khye'u sus dang grogs dag kyang sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid yin na de la khye'u sus dang grogs dag kyang sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If it is a desire, then one should give it to the boy or to the friend.

original: shes gtso'o // nags ma nyul ba nyid dag la'o //
analyzed: shes gtso'o // nags ma nyul ba nyid dag la'o //
translated: The knowledge is the chief.üîΩIn the forest, without having searched.

original: kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol gyi dgon par bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te zos na'o //
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol gyi dgon par bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te zos na'o //
translated: Having taken food and drink outside the monastery, and having eaten.

original: bsrung ba bsgrubs na phyed do //
analyzed: bsrung ba bsgrubs na phyed do //
translated: If one has established protection, it is half.

original: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i gnas nas gzhan du gyur pa nyid du yang ngo //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i gnas nas gzhan du gyur pa nyid du yang ngo //
translated: Also, from a place with fear, to another place.

original: nags ma brtags pa las gyur pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: nags ma brtags pa las gyur pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: From the forest, without having examined, is the fourth confession.

original: // / so sor bshags par bya ba rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / so sor bshags par bya ba rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The confessions are complete.

original: // / sham thabs ci nas kyang zlum por 'dug par 'gyur ba de ltar bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / sham thabs ci nas kyang zlum por 'dug par 'gyur ba de ltar bgo bar bya'o //
translated: The lower robe should be worn so that it is round in every way.üîΩNot too full.

original: ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin par ro //üîΩha cang @49a * //
analyzed: ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin par ro // ha cang @49a * //
translated: Not too low.

original: 'jol pa ma yin par ro //
analyzed: 'jol pa ma yin par ro //
translated: Not too high.

original: grva glang po che'i sna ltar nar ba ma yin par ro //
analyzed: grva glang po che'i sna ltar nar ba ma yin par ro //
translated: Not hanging down like an elephant‚Äôs trunk.

original: gong du ma ltebs bar ro //
analyzed: gong du ma ltebs bar ro //
translated: Not folded in half.

original: phur ma ltar 'dug pa ma yin par ro //
analyzed: phur ma ltar 'dug pa ma yin par ro //
translated: Not like a pile of grain.

original: sprul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar phyir 'byung ba ma yin par ro //
analyzed: sprul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar phyir 'byung ba ma yin par ro //
translated: It is not like the hood of a snake, which is turned outward.

original: chos gos ci nas kyang dang po gsum ltar 'gyur ba de ltar bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos gos ci nas kyang dang po gsum ltar 'gyur ba de ltar bgo bar bya'o //
translated: One should put on the Dharma robes in such a way that they are not like any of the above three.

original: shin tu bsdams shing khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu bsdams shing khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should go to another‚Äôs house with complete restraint.

original: legs par bgos shing ngo //
analyzed: legs par bgos shing ngo //
translated: One should go with proper dress.

original: sgra bskyung zhing ngo //
analyzed: sgra bskyung zhing ngo //
translated: One should go with a low voice.

original: mig g-yeng bar mi bya zhing ngo //
analyzed: mig g-yeng bar mi bya zhing ngo //
translated: One should go without distracting the eyes.

original: gnya' shing gang tsam du blta zhing ngo //
analyzed: gnya' shing gang tsam du blta zhing ngo //
translated: One should go looking ahead only a plow‚Äôs length.

original: mgo mi g-yogs pa'i rnam pas so //üîΩmi brdze bar ro //üîΩmi gzar bar ro //
analyzed: mgo mi g-yogs pa'i rnam pas so // mi brdze bar ro // mi gzar bar ro //
translated: One should go without covering the head.üîΩOne should go without leaning.üîΩOne should go without staggering.

original: gnya' gong du mi bsnol bar ro //üîΩltag par mi bsnol bar ro //üîΩmi mchor bar ro //
analyzed: gnya' gong du mi bsnol bar ro // ltag par mi bsnol bar ro // mi mchor bar ro //
translated: One should go without crossing one‚Äôs arms.üîΩOne should go without crossing one‚Äôs legs.üîΩOne should go without laughing.üîΩOne should go without stretching.

original: mi brkyang bar ro //üîΩtsog pus ma yin par ro //üîΩbrang bas ma yin par ro //
analyzed: mi brkyang bar ro // tsog pus ma yin par ro // brang bas ma yin par ro //
translated: One should go without squatting.üîΩOne should go without leaning on the chest.

original: dkur mi brten par ro //
analyzed: dkur mi brten par ro //
translated: One should go without leaning on the hip.

original: lus mi bsgyur bar ro //
analyzed: lus mi bsgyur bar ro //
translated: One should go without twisting the body.

original: lag pa mi kyog par ro //
analyzed: lag pa mi kyog par ro //
translated: One should go without twisting the arms.

original: mgo mo bsgyur bar ro //üîΩphrag pa mi sprad par ro //
analyzed: mgo mo bsgyur bar ro // phrag pa mi sprad par ro //
translated: One should go without twisting the head.üîΩOne should go without clasping the shoulders.

original: lag pa mi sprel bar ro //
analyzed: lag pa mi sprel bar ro //
translated: One should go without clasping the arms.

original: der ma bsgo bar stan la 'dug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: der ma bsgo bar stan la 'dug par mi bya'o //
translated: Without being invited, one should not sit down on a seat.

original: stan la ma brtags par mi bya'o //üîΩlus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mi dbab par ro //
analyzed: stan la ma brtags par mi bya'o // lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mi dbab par ro //
translated: One should not sit down on a seat without examining it.üîΩOne should not sit down heavily on a seat.

original: rkang pa mi bsnol bar ro //üîΩbrla mi bsnol bar ro //üîΩlong bu'i steng du long bu mi bzhag par ro //
analyzed: rkang pa mi bsnol bar ro // brla mi bsnol bar ro // long bu'i steng du long bu mi bzhag par ro //
translated: One should not sit with one‚Äôs legs crossed.üîΩOne should not sit with one‚Äôs legs extended.

original: rkang pa mi dgug par ro //
analyzed: rkang pa mi dgug par ro //
translated: One should not sit with one ankle on top of the other knee.üîΩOne should not sit with one knee drawn up to the chest.

original: rkang pa mi gdang par ro //üîΩmdoms mi snang bar ro //üîΩlag pa la 'gram pa brten te mi bya'o //
analyzed: rkang pa mi gdang par ro // mdoms mi snang bar ro // lag pa la 'gram pa brten te mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sit with one knee extended.üîΩOne should not sit in such a way that one‚Äôs genitals are exposed.üîΩOne should not sit leaning on one‚Äôs hand.

original: stan thabs bkur bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: stan thabs bkur bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sit raising one‚Äôs buttocks off the seat.

original: thams cad du legs par zas blang bar bya'o //üîΩmu dang kha da chad du ma yin par ro //
analyzed: thams cad du legs par zas blang bar bya'o // mu dang kha da chad du ma yin par ro //
translated: One should receive all the food properly.üîΩOne should not receive too little food.

original: tshod ma dang mnyam pa ma yin par ro //üîΩmthar chags su'o //
analyzed: tshod ma dang mnyam pa ma yin par ro // mthar chags su'o //
translated: One should not receive food that is uneven.üîΩOne should receive food in an orderly fashion.

original: ltung bzed la blta zhing ngo //üîΩbca' ba dang bza' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed mi bzed par ro //
analyzed: ltung bzed la blta zhing ngo // bca' ba dang bza' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed mi bzed par ro //
translated: One should look at the begging bowl while eating.üîΩOne should not hold out the begging bowl in anticipation of food.

original: yang 'dod pa'i phyir 'bras chen gyis tshod ma mi dag pa tshod mas 'bras chen me dgab par ro //
analyzed: yang 'dod pa'i phyir 'bras chen gyis tshod ma mi dag pa tshod mas 'bras chen me dgab par ro //
translated: One should not cover vegetables with rice out of desire for more.

original: steng du gzung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: steng du gzung bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not hold the bowl above the level of one‚Äôs head.

original: legs par zas bza' bar bya'o //üîΩkham ha cang chung bam yin par ro //
analyzed: legs par zas bza' bar bya'o // kham ha cang chung bam yin par ro //
translated: One should eat the food well.üîΩOne should not eat very small morsels.

original: kham ha cang chen po ma yin par ro //üîΩkhar ran par ro //üîΩkham ma gzas par kha mi gdang @49b ngo ;üîΩ/ kha kham gyis bkang ste mi smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: kham ha cang chen po ma yin par ro // khar ran par ro // kham ma gzas par kha mi gdang @49b ngo ; / kha kham gyis bkang ste mi smra bar bya'o //
translated: One should not eat very large morsels.üîΩOne should eat morsels that are appropriate.üîΩOne should not open one‚Äôs mouth before the morsel is ready.üîΩOne should not speak with one‚Äôs mouth full.

original: tsug tsug mi bya'o //üîΩcag cag mi bya'o //üîΩhu hu mi bya'o //üîΩphu phu mi bya'o //
analyzed: tsug tsug mi bya'o // cag cag mi bya'o // hu hu mi bya'o // phu phu mi bya'o //
translated: One should not eat with one‚Äôs mouth full.üîΩOne should not eat with one‚Äôs mouth wide open.üîΩOne should not eat with one‚Äôs mouth agape.

original: lce phyung ste zas mi bza' 'o //
analyzed: lce phyung ste zas mi bza' 'o //
translated: One should not eat with one‚Äôs tongue extended.

original: 'bru nas tha dad du mi bya'o //üîΩ'phyas mi gdags so //üîΩmkhur ba mi spo'o //
analyzed: 'bru nas tha dad du mi bya'o // 'phyas mi gdags so // mkhur ba mi spo'o //
translated: One should not eat by separating the grains.üîΩOne should not eat by picking up the food.

original: rkan mi gtog go //
analyzed: rkan mi gtog go //
translated: One should not eat by blowing on the food.

original: kham 'phror mi gcad do //
analyzed: kham 'phror mi gcad do //
translated: One should not eat by smacking one‚Äôs lips.üîΩOne should not eat by cutting off morsels with the edge of the bowl.

original: lag pa mi ldag go //
analyzed: lag pa mi ldag go //
translated: One should not eat by licking one‚Äôs hands.

original: lhung bzed mi byog go //üîΩlag pa mi sprug go //
analyzed: lhung bzed mi byog go // lag pa mi sprug go //
translated: One should not eat by licking the bowl.üîΩOne should not eat by shaking the hands.

original: lhung bzed mi bskyam mo //
analyzed: lhung bzed mi bskyam mo //
translated: One should not eat by shaking the bowl.

original: mchod rten 'dra bar byas te mi gzhom mo //
analyzed: mchod rten 'dra bar byas te mi gzhom mo //
translated: One should not eat by making a sound with the bowl.

original: drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung bzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta'o //
analyzed: drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung bzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta'o //
translated: One should not look at the bowl of the monk sitting in front in order to criticize it.

original: lag pa zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la mi bzung ngo //
analyzed: lag pa zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la mi bzung ngo //
translated: Do not hold a water vessel with a hand that is soiled with food.

original: drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chus mi gtor ro //
analyzed: drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chus mi gtor ro //
translated: Do not splash water on a fellow monk who is sitting nearby.

original: khyim pa 'dug pa la ma dris par de khyim du mi dbo'o //
analyzed: khyim pa 'dug pa la ma dris par de khyim du mi dbo'o //
translated: Do not throw [food scraps] into a house without asking permission of the householder.

original: lhung bzed kyi nang du zas kyi lhag ma blugs te mi dbo bar ro //
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi nang du zas kyi lhag ma blugs te mi dbo bar ro //
translated: Do not throw leftover food into the begging bowl.

original: lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus te gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa dag gi bzlas brjod byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus te gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa dag gi bzlas brjod byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par bya'o //
translated: After washing the begging bowl three times, give the water from the begging bowl, reciting the verses of the U·πákƒÅra S≈´tra.

original: 'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed mi bzhag par ro //üîΩgad ka ma yin par ro //
analyzed: 'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed mi bzhag par ro // gad ka ma yin par ro //
translated: Do not place the begging bowl on the ground without a support.üîΩDo not [place it] on a slope.

original: g-yangs ma yin par ro //üîΩdkan gzar po ma yin par ro //
analyzed: g-yangs ma yin par ro // dkan gzar po ma yin par ro //
translated: Do not [place it] in an uneven place.üîΩDo not [place it] on a steep slope.

original: 'greng ste lhung bzed mi bkru bar ro //
analyzed: 'greng ste lhung bzed mi bkru bar ro //
translated: Do not wash the begging bowl while standing.

original: de de gsum du mi bya bar ro //
analyzed: de de gsum du mi bya bar ro //
translated: Do not do these three things while standing.

original: nges 'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste chu mi bcu bar ro //
analyzed: nges 'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste chu mi bcu bar ro //
translated: Do not scoop water back into a strong current.

original: lam gyi bzhi mdor mi bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi bzhi mdor mi bya'o //
translated: Do not do this at a crossroads.

original: bshang gci yan chad ni mi na ba la'o /üîΩde dag la ni min bar ro //
analyzed: bshang gci yan chad ni mi na ba la'o / de dag la ni min bar ro //
translated: Except if you are sick, do not teach Dharma to someone who is eating, chewing, or holding food or drink in their hand.

original: 'dug pa la 'greng ste chos mi bshad par ro ;üîΩ/ nyal ba la 'dug ste mi bshad par ro //üîΩstan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad par ro //
analyzed: 'dug pa la 'greng ste chos mi bshad par ro ; / nyal ba la 'dug ste mi bshad par ro // stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad par ro //
translated: Do not teach Dharma to someone who is lying down, unless you are sick.üîΩDo not teach Dharma to someone who is sitting on a high seat, unless you are sick.

original: ngan pa dang bzang po yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ngan pa dang bzang po yang de bzhin no //
translated: Do not teach Dharma to someone who is sitting in a better seat than yours, unless you are sick.

original: mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing mi bshad par ro //
analyzed: mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing mi bshad par ro //
translated: Do not teach Dharma to someone who is walking in front while you walk behind.

original: lam nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing mi bshad par ro //üîΩmgo g-yogs pa dang / brdzes pa dang / gzar ba dang / gnya' gong du bsnol ba dang / lhag par bsnol ba la mi bshad par ro //üîΩmgo do kar can dang / zhva gyon pa dang / cod pan can dang / phreng ba can dang / dkris pa la mi @50a * //
analyzed: lam nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing mi bshad par ro // mgo g-yogs pa dang / brdzes pa dang / gzar ba dang / gnya' gong du bsnol ba dang / lhag par bsnol ba la mi bshad par ro // mgo do kar can dang / zhva gyon pa dang / cod pan can dang / phreng ba can dang / dkris pa la mi @50a * //
translated: Do not teach Dharma to someone who is walking on the path while you walk on the edge of the path.üîΩDo not teach Dharma to someone who is wearing a headdress, a turban, or a crown; who has their head covered, their head wrapped, or their head shaved; or who has their head wrapped in a cloth.

original: bshad par ro //
analyzed: bshad par ro //
translated: Do not teach Dharma to someone who is wearing shoes, boots, or sandals; who is wearing a turban; who is wearing a crown; who is wearing a garland; or who is wearing their hair in a topknot.

original: glang po che dang rta zhon pa dang / khyogs dang bzhon pa'i steng na 'dug pa dang mchil lham gyon pa la mi bshad par ro //
analyzed: glang po che dang rta zhon pa dang / khyogs dang bzhon pa'i steng na 'dug pa dang mchil lham gyon pa la mi bshad par ro //
translated: One should not explain the teaching to someone riding an elephant, a horse, or a carriage, or to someone sitting in a palanquin or on a seat, or to someone wearing shoes.

original: lag na 'khar ba thogs pa dang / gdugs dang / mtshon cha dang / ral gri dang dgra cha thogs pa dang / go cha gyon pa la ni mi bshad par ro //
analyzed: lag na 'khar ba thogs pa dang / gdugs dang / mtshon cha dang / ral gri dang dgra cha thogs pa dang / go cha gyon pa la ni mi bshad par ro //
translated: One should not explain the teaching to someone holding a staff, an umbrella, a weapon, a sword, or a shield, or to someone wearing armor.

original: 'greng ste bshar gci mi bya bar ro //
analyzed: 'greng ste bshar gci mi bya bar ro //
translated: One should not urinate or defecate while standing.

original: chu'i nang du mi bya bar ro //

analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i 'og tu der mi 'gro ba la'o // yul 'khor dogs pa dang bcas par 'gro ba la'o //

analyzed: stan bting ste phan tshun kun dga' bar byas nas lung dri ba'i sbyor bas skabs 'byed du gzhug par bya'o //

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi chos can nyid ma yin pa ni reg pa ma yi pa'i yan lag yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi chos can nyid ma yin pa ni reg pa ma yi pa'i yan lag yin no //
translated: The non-possession of the factors of spiritual power is the non-possession of the factors of spiritual power.

original: reg par bya ba nyid ni ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: reg par bya ba nyid ni ma nyams pa'o //
translated: The non-deterioration of the tangible is the non-deterioration of the tangible.

original: ga ga tshig bye pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: ga ga tshig bye pa la yang ngo //
translated: The non-deterioration of the voice is the non-deterioration of the voice.

original: sen mo dang so dang sha med pa'i rus pa dang spu dag ni gzhan dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: sen mo dang so dang sha med pa'i rus pa dang spu dag ni gzhan dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
translated: The non-possession of nails, teeth, flesh, and hair is the non-possession of nails, teeth, flesh, and hair.

original: mi'i 'gro ba ni tha snyad du bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi'i 'gro ba ni tha snyad du bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The human destiny is the human destiny.

original: rang bzhin nyams pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyams pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The non-deterioration of the nature is the non-deterioration of the nature.

original: ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa ngag ni de dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa ngag ni de dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: The non-possession of the voice of a eunuch or hermaphrodite is the non-possession of the voice of a eunuch or hermaphrodite.

original: reg pa ni tha snyad dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni tha snyad dang 'dra'o //
translated: The non-deterioration of contact is the non-deterioration of contact.

original: phyi rol bar pa'i rab tu byung ba dang ma chags pa dang nyams pa dag ni phyed nyid khyim pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol bar pa'i rab tu byung ba dang ma chags pa dang nyams pa dag ni phyed nyid khyim pa'o //
translated: The householder who has gone forth in the middle period and the non-attached and deteriorated ones are half householders.

original: dge slong dang dge slong ma brnyes par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa nyid ni bslab pa dag la yan lag nyid yin no //
analyzed: dge slong dang dge slong ma brnyes par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa nyid ni bslab pa dag la yan lag nyid yin no //
translated: The non-deterioration of the complete training in the precepts of a fully ordained monk or nun is the branch of the training.

original: mtshan dang khas blangs pa dag gis ni rang gi phyogs nyid kyi khongs su gtogs so //
analyzed: mtshan dang khas blangs pa dag gis ni rang gi phyogs nyid kyi khongs su gtogs so //
translated: The characteristics and the vows are included in one's own faction.

original: 'dir gtogs pa la khyim pa la ni rtags can nyid kyi bas na smad do //
analyzed: 'dir gtogs pa la khyim pa la ni rtags can nyid kyi bas na smad do //
translated: Here, one's own faction is the laity, and the monks are despised.

original: rab tu byung ba'i rdzas dag la ni rung ba nyid dang tshad dang ldan pa la sogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba'i rdzas dag la ni rung ba nyid dang tshad dang ldan pa la sogs pa nyid do //
translated: The monks' requisites are proper, of the right measure, and so on.

original: rang gi don nyid gtso cher yod pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi don nyid gtso cher yod pa'o //
translated: One's own purpose is primary.

original: rnam par rig byed la ni don go ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed la ni don go ba'o //
translated: In informative action, the meaning is understood.

original: smra ba po nyid la yod pa ste gsod pa dang rang gi don du rku ba dag las gzhan pa'i'o //
analyzed: smra ba po nyid la yod pa ste gsod pa dang rang gi don du rku ba dag las gzhan pa'i'o //
translated: It exists in speech itself, in killing and stealing for one's own sake, and in others.

original: yang dag par len par byed pa la ni der ma zad do //
analyzed: yang dag par len par byed pa la ni der ma zad do //
translated: In correct taking, it is not just that.

original: de ni snod yin no //
analyzed: de ni snod yin no //
translated: That is the vessel.üîΩOf speech.

original: ngag gi'o // rang gi'o //üîΩbdag nyid dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: ngag gi'o // rang gi'o // bdag nyid dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: Of oneself.

original: rang gis bskos pa nyid byed du bcug pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gis bskos pa nyid byed du bcug pa yin no //
translated: One's own appointed person is made to do it.

original: rnam par 'byed par gtogs pa phal che ba'i phyir bstan pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed par gtogs pa phal che ba'i phyir bstan pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The teachings are completed because they belong to the majority.

original: // / spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: // / spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o //
translated: The yogi should not meditate while in the range of activity of the senses.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba yang mi bya'o //
translated: He should not engage in mental construction.

original: rnam par g-yeng bar yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng bar yang mi bya'o //
translated: He should not be distracted.

original: rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa dag gtum po dang gya tshom pa dag yongs su sbar bar rigs so //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa dag gtum po dang gya tshom pa dag yongs su sbar bar rigs so //
translated: It is proper to burn those who are distracted, those who are violent and those who are rash.

original: spong khang brtsig par bya'o //
analyzed: spong khang brtsig par bya'o //
translated: A meditation hut should be built.

original: gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang gdod do //
analyzed: gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang gdod do //
translated: A path should be made between the two houses.

original: lnga'am drug gi'o //
analyzed: lnga'am drug gi'o //
translated: It should be five or six cubits wide.

original: sgo glags sgra mi 'byung ba dang drang ba'i thabs @56a * //
analyzed: sgo glags sgra mi 'byung ba dang drang ba'i thabs @56a * //
translated: The door should be made soundless and straight.

original: kyang ngo // gong du sum cha bor bar skar khung phyi rub la nang yangs pa yang bzang ngo //
analyzed: kyang ngo // gong du sum cha bor bar skar khung phyi rub la nang yangs pa yang bzang ngo //
translated: It is also good if the window is narrow outside and wide inside, leaving out one third of the upper part.

original: dra ba dang sgo glegs dang 'phred gtan dang gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan dang dbyug gu skam kha nye bar bzhag go //
analyzed: dra ba dang sgo glegs dang 'phred gtan dang gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan dang dbyug gu skam kha nye bar bzhag go //
translated: Nets, doors, crossbars, roof beams, door bolts and door handles should be installed.

original: mi shong na steng du khang mo che bya'o ;
analyzed: mi shong na steng du khang mo che bya'o ;
translated: If it is too small, a large upper story should be built.

original: / yang na yang thog go //
analyzed: / yang na yang thog go //
translated: Or else, a terrace.

original: 'jog pa'i phyir them skas so //
analyzed: 'jog pa'i phyir them skas so //
translated: A staircase is for climbing up.

original: mi ltung bar bya ba'i phyir kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi ltung bar bya ba'i phyir kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o //
translated: In order to prevent it from falling, it is surrounded by a rim.

original: de mi 'gul bar bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab bo //
analyzed: de mi 'gul bar bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab bo //
translated: In order to prevent it from moving, it is fastened with iron pegs.

original: phyi rol du spong kha chen po'am gnas khang gi tshar dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: phyi rol du spong kha chen po'am gnas khang gi tshar dag kyang ngo //
translated: Outside, there is a large courtyard or a house.

original: sgo'i thad kar sgo gdod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sgo'i thad kar sgo gdod par mi bya'o //
translated: The door should not be placed directly in front of the door of the house.

original: sgo khang bya'o //
analyzed: sgo khang bya'o //
translated: A porch should be built.

original: phug kyang ngo //
analyzed: phug kyang ngo //
translated: A cave is also suitable.

original: 'dug pa'i ched du sa'i stegs bu dag dang khri'u yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dug pa'i ched du sa'i stegs bu dag dang khri'u yang ngo //
translated: For sitting, there are platforms and benches.

original: de ni kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba bzang ngo //
analyzed: de ni kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba bzang ngo //
translated: It is good if they are four cubits in circumference.

original: thags ma ni rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: thags ma ni rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: There are five kinds of cloth:

original: mun dza'i dang sha na'i dang gres ma'i dang ras ma'i dang sba phra mo'i'o //
analyzed: mun dza'i dang sha na'i dang gres ma'i dang ras ma'i dang sba phra mo'i'o //
translated: cloth from m≈´za, cloth from ≈õƒÅ·πáa, cloth from hemp, cloth from cotton, and cloth from fine silk.

original: der stan nang tshangs can dag gding ngo //
analyzed: der stan nang tshangs can dag gding ngo //
translated: A mattress with cotton is spread on that.

original: der kho ra khor yug tu mtho gang lhag pa dag bzang ngo //
analyzed: der kho ra khor yug tu mtho gang lhag pa dag bzang ngo //
translated: It is good if it is one cubit higher all around.

original: aarka'i dang ka sha'i dang aer ka'i dang spra ba'i dang shal ma la'i dag gi bal gyis dgang ngo //
analyzed: aarka'i dang ka sha'i dang aer ka'i dang spra ba'i dang shal ma la'i dag gi bal gyis dgang ngo //
translated: It is filled with wool from arka, ka≈õa, eraka, cane, and ≈õalmali.

original: gal dang sha na dang ras bal dang ras ma dag dang lo ma'i tshogs dag gis kyang ngo //
analyzed: gal dang sha na dang ras bal dang ras ma dag dang lo ma'i tshogs dag gis kyang ngo //
translated: Also with cotton, linen, silk, and leaves.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug par bya ba'i phyir mdo mdor bya rog rkang dag bya'o //
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug par bya ba'i phyir mdo mdor bya rog rkang dag bya'o //
translated: In order to sit in the right way, one should make a crow‚Äôs foot.

original: gnyid bro na dgos bu dag gdags par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyid bro na dgos bu dag gdags par bya'o //
translated: If one is sleepy, one should place the feet on a stool.

original: dbyug gus dal bus gzugs bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyug gus dal bus gzugs bar bya'o //
translated: One should stretch slowly with a stick.

original: snad par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur ras ma dag gis dkris pas so //
analyzed: snad par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur ras ma dag gis dkris pas so //
translated: In order not to hurt oneself, one should wrap the feet with a cloth, like a saw.

original: po long 'phang bar bya'o //
analyzed: po long 'phang bar bya'o //

original: yang phyir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir tha gus gdags par bya'o //
analyzed: yang phyir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir tha gus gdags par bya'o //
translated: In order to come back, one should tie them with a rope.

original: mdun du mar me gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: mdun du mar me gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place a lamp in front.

original: rkang pa dbyung ngo //
analyzed: rkang pa dbyung ngo //
translated: One should take out the feet.

original: ya gcig brkyang ngo //
analyzed: ya gcig brkyang ngo //
translated: One should stretch one foot.

original: mi 'thom par bya ba'i phyir phreng thag lta bu la bskon pa'i sbu gu 'am de la btags pa'i tha gu la 'jus te bcag par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'thom par bya ba'i phyir phreng thag lta bu la bskon pa'i sbu gu 'am de la btags pa'i tha gu la 'jus te bcag par bya'o //
translated: In order not to stumble, one should hold a stick like a rosary or a rope tied to it and lean on it.

original: mchil lham can gyis bcag par mi @56b bya'o ;
analyzed: mchil lham can gyis bcag par mi @56b bya'o ;
translated: One should not lean with shoes on.

original: / rkang pa gnyis la rdul mi gos par bya ba'i phyir par tang gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: / rkang pa gnyis la rdul mi gos par bya ba'i phyir par tang gding bar bya'o //
translated: A mat should be spread on the ground to protect the feet from dust.

original: spong ba pas zhag gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o //
analyzed: spong ba pas zhag gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o //
translated: The one who is to be expelled should anoint his feet with oil for three days.

original: ma nus na der yang nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma nus na der yang nyal bar bya'o //
translated: If he is unable to do so, he should sleep there.

original: sgo gcad par bya'o //üîΩglos kyang phab ste'o //
analyzed: sgo gcad par bya'o // glos kyang phab ste'o //
translated: The door should be closed.üîΩHe should lie down on his side.

original: spong pa pa'i phyir zhal ta ba bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: spong pa pa'i phyir zhal ta ba bsko bar bya'o //
translated: A servant should be appointed for the one who is to be expelled.

original: de'i bya ba ni langs ma thag kho nar chag chag gdab pa dang phyag dar bya ba dang lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni langs ma thag kho nar chag chag gdab pa dang phyag dar bya ba dang lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o //
translated: His duties are to sprinkle water, sweep, and anoint with cow dung as soon as he gets up.

original: stan bsham par bya'o //
analyzed: stan bsham par bya'o //

original: mi gtsang ba'i skyabs gnyis byi dor bya'o //
analyzed: mi gtsang ba'i skyabs gnyis byi dor bya'o //
translated: He should clean the two impure shelters.

original: chag chag la sogs pas so ;
analyzed: chag chag la sogs pas so ;
translated: By sprinkling water, etc.

original: / bong rdog dang sa dang chu dag bzhag bar bya'o //
analyzed: / bong rdog dang sa dang chu dag bzhag bar bya'o //
translated: He should place a lump of clay, earth, and water.

original: bsdu pa'i phyir gand'i brdung ngo //
analyzed: bsdu pa'i phyir gand'i brdung ngo //
translated: He should ring the gandi for the sake of gathering.

original: de'i gnas ni khang steng ngo //
analyzed: de'i gnas ni khang steng ngo //
translated: His place is on the roof of the house.

original: dge 'dun bsdu pa'i phyir ni rgyud gsum dang de snyed kyi tog dag go //
analyzed: dge 'dun bsdu pa'i phyir ni rgyud gsum dang de snyed kyi tog dag go //
translated: For the sake of gathering the Sangha, there are three types of gandi and as many types of sticks.

original: las bya ba'i don du ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo //
analyzed: las bya ba'i don du ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo //
translated: For the purpose of work, one should use a staff with one knot and three points.

original: kha cig las ni rgyud gsum dang tog gnyis so zhe'o //
analyzed: kha cig las ni rgyud gsum dang tog gnyis so zhe'o //

original: shi ba la phrag pa dbyung ba'i don du ni byi ba'o //
analyzed: shi ba la phrag pa dbyung ba'i don du ni byi ba'o //

original: kha cig las ni rgyud gcig dang tog gcig go zhe'o //
analyzed: kha cig las ni rgyud gcig dang tog gcig go zhe'o //
translated: According to some, one should use a staff with one knot and one point.

original: spong ba pa'i don du ni khar gsil lo //
analyzed: spong ba pa'i don du ni khar gsil lo //
translated: For the purpose of renunciation, one should use a staff with a hole.

original: kha cig las ni gand'i chung du zhe'o ;
analyzed: kha cig las ni gand'i chung du zhe'o ;
translated: According to some, one should use a small staff.

original: / gnod pa byung ba la ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o //
analyzed: / gnod pa byung ba la ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o //
translated: When harm arises, one should use as much as is necessary.

original: zan gyi phyir 'du ba'i don du gand'i dang gand'i chung du gnyis ka brdung ngo //
analyzed: zan gyi phyir 'du ba'i don du gand'i dang gand'i chung du gnyis ka brdung ngo //
translated: For the purpose of gathering for a meal, one should beat both the large and small wooden sounding boards.

original: bar du bcad de'o //
analyzed: bar du bcad de'o //
translated: In the middle, one should interrupt.

original: brgyang bas so //
analyzed: brgyang bas so //
translated: By extending.

original: 'dus pa chen po'i tshe gand'i brdungs pas go bar mi 'gyur ba lta na dung sgril te bud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po'i tshe gand'i brdungs pas go bar mi 'gyur ba lta na dung sgril te bud par bya'o //
translated: If one does not understand by beating the large wooden sounding board at the time of the great assembly, one should blow the conch.

original: rnga bo che dag brdung ngo //
analyzed: rnga bo che dag brdung ngo //
translated: One should beat the large drum.

original: gand'i brdungs par mi 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gand'i brdungs par mi 'gro bar mi bya'o //
