original: der mi myur bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: der mi myur bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not be slow in going there.

original: bya ba 'grub pa'i dus kyi lhag ma lus pa tsam ni rgyun chags gsum pa gdon cing ci bder bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba 'grub pa'i dus kyi lhag ma lus pa tsam ni rgyun chags gsum pa gdon cing ci bder bya'o //
translated: The remaining part of the time for accomplishing the rite should be spent in the third continuous period, which is free and easy.

original: der na bar bya'o //
analyzed: der na bar bya'o //
translated: One should be sick there.

original: yon bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yon bshad par bya'o //
translated: One should explain the gifts.

original: ran par ro //
analyzed: ran par ro //
translated: One should do it in moderation.

original: spong ba pa'i zhal ta ba sngar 'du zhing mjug tu 'gyes par bya'o //
analyzed: spong ba pa'i zhal ta ba sngar 'du zhing mjug tu 'gyes par bya'o //
translated: The attendant of the one who is to be admitted should gather first and disperse last.

original: gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na lde mig sbas pa bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na lde mig sbas pa bstan par bya'o //
translated: If such a condition arises, the hidden key should be shown.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi las zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong gi skabs so /üîΩ// / gso sbyong @57a * //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi las zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong gi skabs so / // / gso sbyong @57a * //
translated: This is the section on the po·π£adha of tranquility from the foundation of the po·π£adha.

original: gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o //
analyzed: gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o //
translated: One should be in harmony with the site of the po·π£adha.

original: gnas thams cad grub pa'am byas pa'am zin pa la'o //
analyzed: gnas thams cad grub pa'am byas pa'am zin pa la'o //
translated: It should be in a place that is finished, made, or completed.

original: phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It should have an outer area one fathom around.

original: dge 'dun 'dod na'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun 'dod na'o //
translated: It should be if the sa·πÉgha desires it.

original: las gzhan gyi gnas kyang de yin no //
analyzed: las gzhan gyi gnas kyang de yin no //
translated: It is also the site for other rites.

original: mtshams gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams gcad par bya'o //
translated: One should establish the boundary.

original: dpag chad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du'o //
analyzed: dpag chad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du'o //
translated: It should be within a distance of one and a half kro≈õas.

original: phyogs phyogs su pha bong dang rtseg pa dang ka ba dang shing ljon pa dang ra ba dang bya skyi bas dang lam po che dang khron pa la sogs pa da shes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brtags nas dge 'dun gyi mdun du mtshan ma brtan po brjod
analyzed: phyogs phyogs su pha bong dang rtseg pa dang ka ba dang shing ljon pa dang ra ba dang bya skyi bas dang lam po che dang khron pa la sogs pa da shes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brtags nas dge 'dun gyi mdun du mtshan ma brtan po brjod
translated: In each direction, the monks who know the boundaries should investigate the boundaries, such as boulders, walls, pillars, trees, fences, anthills, roads, and wells, and then declare the firm boundaries in the presence of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: de las bya'o //
analyzed: de las bya'o //
translated: The boundary should be made from that.

original: der gnas pa byas na chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der gnas pa byas na chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one stays there, one will not be separated from one's robes.

original: de bya'o // thams cad kyi ched du dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bya'o //
analyzed: de bya'o // thams cad kyi ched du dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bya'o //
translated: That should be done. For the sake of all, an agreement should be made within the boundary.

original: snga ma bag yangs su ma byas par gcad pa gzhan mi 'chags so //
analyzed: snga ma bag yangs su ma byas par gcad pa gzhan mi 'chags so //
translated: Without relaxing the previous agreement, another agreement should not be made.

original: mtshams dag dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams dag dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: The boundaries should be released.

original: tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis gcad pa dang dgrol du rung ngo //
analyzed: tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis gcad pa dang dgrol du rung ngo //
translated: It is suitable to cut and release two boundaries with one statement.

original: mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su ni las la rtsig pa mtshams yin no //
analyzed: mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su ni las la rtsig pa mtshams yin no //
translated: In a place where the boundaries have not been cut, the wall is the boundary for the ritual.

original: wa kha nas chu 'dzag pa gang du bab pa yang ngo //
analyzed: wa kha nas chu 'dzag pa gang du bab pa yang ngo //
translated: Where the water drips from the spout, that is also [the boundary].

original: grong la ni nye 'khor gyi mtha' chun chad do //
analyzed: grong la ni nye 'khor gyi mtha' chun chad do //
translated: In a village, the boundary is the end of the surrounding area.

original: dgon pa la ni phyogs phyogs su rgyang grags kyi mtha' tshun chad do //
analyzed: dgon pa la ni phyogs phyogs su rgyang grags kyi mtha' tshun chad do //
translated: In the case of a monastery, it is within a distance of one kro≈õa in each direction.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs so /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs so /
translated: This concludes the section on the basis of the purification ceremony.

original: // /'dun pa 'bul pa las de dang mthun pa 'grub po //
analyzed: // /'dun pa 'bul pa las de dang mthun pa 'grub po //
translated: If one offers one's consent, it is accomplished in accordance with that.

original: mtshams bcad pa la ni mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: mtshams bcad pa la ni mi 'grub bo //
translated: If the boundary is not established, it is not accomplished.

original: bslab pa byin pa las de blang du rung ngo //
analyzed: bslab pa byin pa las de blang du rung ngo //
translated: If one gives the training, it is suitable to receive it.

original: de la dge slong gi 'du shes nye bar gzhag pa la'o //
analyzed: de la dge slong gi 'du shes nye bar gzhag pa la'o //
translated: In that case, one should establish the perception of a fully ordained monk.

original: dbul du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: dbul du mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not suitable to offer.

original: smyos pa'i gnang ba thob pas ni mi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smyos pa'i gnang ba thob pas ni mi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one obtains permission from the insane, it does not become non-consensual.

original: yongs su dag pa phul ba dang yang gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa phul ba dang yang gcig pa nyid do //
translated: It is the same as offering complete purity.

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la'o //
translated: It is for the purification ceremony and the end of the rainy season retreat.

original: de phul bas so //
analyzed: de phul bas so //
translated: By offering that.

original: de bzhin du de gnyis la bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de gnyis la bya'o //
translated: It should be done in the same way for those two.

original: cho ga de mnod par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga de mnod par bya'o //
translated: That ritual should be undertaken.

original: tshogs tha dad pas 'dun pa la sogs pas mthun par byas te las byed pa la mi rung ba med do //
analyzed: tshogs tha dad pas 'dun pa la sogs pas mthun par byas te las byed pa la mi rung ba med do //
translated: There is no fault in a group with different assemblies performing the purification ceremony and so forth in accordance with that and performing the rite.

original: brjod par bya ba rtsom pa dang 'dra ba rnams cig car brjod pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba rtsom pa dang 'dra ba rnams cig car brjod pa la yang ngo //
translated: If the things to be said are similar to the beginning of a composition, they are also to be said at once.

original: gcig gis @57b du ma'i de dag len pa la yang med do //
analyzed: gcig gis @57b du ma'i de dag len pa la yang med do //
translated: And there is no [need to] take them one by one.

original: 'di la brjod nus pa'i tshig gis gzung ngo //
analyzed: 'di la brjod nus pa'i tshig gis gzung ngo //
translated: Here, they are to be taken with words that are able to express them.

original: mi nus na de dag dbul ba gang yang rung bas 'grub bo //
analyzed: mi nus na de dag dbul ba gang yang rung bas 'grub bo //
translated: If they are not able to, they are accomplished by any suitable offering.

original: lus kyis yang ngo //
analyzed: lus kyis yang ngo //
translated: And also by the body.

original: ji ltar yang mi nus na yang na dge 'dun der 'gro bar bya //
analyzed: ji ltar yang mi nus na yang na dge 'dun der 'gro bar bya //
translated: If one is not able at all, one should go to the Sa·πÖgha there.

original: yang na des khris blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na des khris blang bar bya'o //
translated: Or, it should be taken by him.

original: de blangs nas rgyug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de blangs nas rgyug par mi bya'o //
translated: Having taken it, one should not run.

original: mgyogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mgyogs par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not go quickly.

original: mchod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mchod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not make offerings.

original: phyi rol la mchong bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol la mchong bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not jump outside.

original: bang rim la mchong bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bang rim la mchong bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not jump on the steps.

original: nam mkha' la 'dug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'dug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sit in the sky.

original: phyi rol la mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol la mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do it outside.

original: skas kyi rim pa gzhan bzhag nas gzhan du gom pa dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: skas kyi rim pa gzhan bzhag nas gzhan du gom pa dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: Having placed another step of the ladder, one should not step on another.

original: them skas kyi them par mi bya'o //
analyzed: them skas kyi them par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not do it on the steps of the staircase.

original: chu lkog ma nub tsam la 'bog par mi bya'o //
analyzed: chu lkog ma nub tsam la 'bog par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not swim in water that is only up to one's neck.

original: gnyid log pa dang snyoms par 'jug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnyid log pa dang snyoms par 'jug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not fall asleep or enter into meditative concentration.

original: de gnyis ni ma klas pa nyid kyis kyang smad par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis ni ma klas pa nyid kyis kyang smad par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: These two are to be condemned because they are the most extreme cases.

original: dge slong la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong la brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should inform a monk.

original: kha cig las dge 'dun la zhe'o //
analyzed: kha cig las dge 'dun la zhe'o //
translated: Some say: to the community.

original: btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol zhes bya bas brtsam mo //
analyzed: btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol zhes bya bas brtsam mo //
translated: One should begin with the words, ‚ÄúVenerable Ones, please give your attention.‚Äù

original: dge 'dun gyi nang du ma phyin par dus byas sam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas blangs na ma blangs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi nang du ma phyin par dus byas sam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas blangs na ma blangs pa nyid yin no //
translated: If one dies without having entered the midst of the community, or if one accepts the status of a householder, etc., it is not accepted.

original: phyin na blangs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyin na blangs pa nyid yin no //
translated: If one has entered, it is accepted.

original: gzhan gyis tshes bco lnga la dge slong bzung na de la dge slong 'di bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis thong shig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis tshes bco lnga la dge slong bzung na de la dge slong 'di bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis thong shig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: If someone seizes a monk on the fifteenth day, one should say to him, ‚ÄúThis monk is a fellow practitioner of the pure life with us. Release him.‚Äù

original: ma btang na bdag cag 'di dang lhan cig bya ba cung zhig yod do zhes snga ma dang bcas te'o //
analyzed: ma btang na bdag cag 'di dang lhan cig bya ba cung zhig yod do zhes snga ma dang bcas te'o //
translated: If he does not release him, saying, ‚ÄúI have some business to do with him,‚Äù one should go with him.

original: de ltan yang dkyil 'khor ba bya'o //
analyzed: de ltan yang dkyil 'khor ba bya'o //
translated: Even so, one should make a circle.

original: de btang ba'i phyir sngar mi 'bad par bya'o //
analyzed: de btang ba'i phyir sngar mi 'bad par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not be negligent in the beginning in order to give it up.

original: 'phrigs pas mi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phrigs pas mi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one is afraid, it becomes a fault.

original: tha dad pa nyid du 'dod pas mngon par brtags te las byed na nyes pa spom po'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du 'dod pas mngon par brtags te las byed na nyes pa spom po'o //
translated: If one imagines that one should do the action with the desire for difference, it is a gross fault.

original: rtog pa nyid na the tshom za'am nges par byed pa la ni nyes pa'i byed pa mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa nyid na the tshom za'am nges par byed pa la ni nyes pa'i byed pa mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: If one has doubt or is uncertain when one is imagining, the action of the fault does not occur.

original: bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su btsal zhing gob lom ma byas na dag pa'i byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su btsal zhing gob lom ma byas na dag pa'i byed pa yin no //
translated: If one searches thoroughly and does not deceive with a sincere intention, it is the action of purification.

original: btsal ba dang bod pa dang mthon por 'dug ste phyogs su lta ba dag gis ni de ma yin no //
analyzed: btsal ba dang bod pa dang mthon por 'dug ste phyogs su lta ba dag gis ni de ma yin no //
translated: If one searches, deceives, and looks around while standing high, it is not that.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs so /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs so /
translated: This concludes the section on the assembly of the Upo·π£adha that is in accord with the Upo·π£adha basis.

original: // / @58a * //  gso sbyong bya'o //
analyzed: // / @58a * //  gso sbyong bya'o //
translated: The Upo·π£adha should be done.

original: zla ba phyed cing tshes bco lnga la'o //
analyzed: zla ba phyed cing tshes bco lnga la'o //
translated: It is on the fifteenth day of the month.

original: so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pas so //
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pas so //
translated: It is done by reciting the PrƒÅtimok·π£a S≈´tra.

original: dgag dbye byas nas 'di ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag dbye byas nas 'di ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: If the PravƒÅra·πáa is done, it is not that it is not accomplished.

original: gsol ba dang rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin du gzhug pa sngar bya zhing de gdon to //
analyzed: gsol ba dang rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin du gzhug pa sngar bya zhing de gdon to //
translated: The announcement and the proclamation of the motion should be made first, and then the resolution.

original: gleng gzhi gdon pa dang gsol ba ni tshig tu brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gleng gzhi gdon pa dang gsol ba ni tshig tu brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The announcement and the proclamation of the motion are accomplished by the mere utterance of the words.

original: lhag ma ni thos pas bsgrags pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: lhag ma ni thos pas bsgrags pas kyang ngo //
translated: The rest is accomplished by the communication of the information.

original: brtsams pa'i sde tshan ni rdzogs par bya dgos so //
analyzed: brtsams pa'i sde tshan ni rdzogs par bya dgos so //
translated: The section on the beginning is to be completed.

original: bzhi pa la reg na ril gyis so //
analyzed: bzhi pa la reg na ril gyis so //
translated: In the fourth, the whole is touched.

original: 'di la zla ba phyed 'das pa'i so so brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la zla ba phyed 'das pa'i so so brtag par bya'o //
translated: Here, the individual should be examined every half-month.

original: 'du bar 'gyur ba der ro //
analyzed: 'du bar 'gyur ba der ro //
translated: The assembly should be in that place.

original: shes pa phyir bcos te thams cad du 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa phyir bcos te thams cad du 'dug par bya'o //
translated: The knowledge should be corrected and everyone should sit down.

original: 'dug pa na dran nam yid gnyis za na drung na mo la byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa na dran nam yid gnyis za na drung na mo la byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: If, while sitting, he remembers or doubts, he should be consecrated in the presence of the community.

original: las byed pas ni sems kyis so //
analyzed: las byed pas ni sems kyis so //
translated: The act should be done by the mind.

original: gal te chos bco lnga la bdag gcig pu de dang mi ldan par shes na 'grogs pa shes la drang por 'bad par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te chos bco lnga la bdag gcig pu de dang mi ldan par shes na 'grogs pa shes la drang por 'bad par bya'o //
translated: If he knows that he is not endowed with the fifteen dharmas, he should know the companionship and strive for honesty.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dang 'di lta bu byed pa gang yin pa des cir 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dang 'di lta bu byed pa gang yin pa des cir 'gyur //
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable, what will happen to those who do such and such?‚Äù

original: ltung ba dang bcas par ro //
analyzed: ltung ba dang bcas par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThey will have a downfall.‚Äù

original: 'o na tshe dang ldan pas kyang 'di dang 'di lta bu byas sam /
analyzed: 'o na tshe dang ldan pas kyang 'di dang 'di lta bu byas sam /
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable, have you done such and such?‚Äù

original: byas so // 'o na tshe dang ldan pa yang ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: byas so // 'o na tshe dang ldan pa yang ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúYes, I have.‚Äù ‚ÄúThen you have a downfall, too.‚Äù

original: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo gcig pur ma zad kyi dge 'dun thams cad don de dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo gcig pur ma zad kyi dge 'dun thams cad don de dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable, it‚Äôs not just me. The whole community is in the same situation.‚Äù

original: kye tshe dang ldan pa je khyod rang gi ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir gyis shig / dge 'dun thams cad kyis khyod la cir 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsom pas mig lam du lhag ma 'dod pa rnams 'chags su gzhug go //
analyzed: kye tshe dang ldan pa je khyod rang gi ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir gyis shig / dge 'dun thams cad kyis khyod la cir 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsom pas mig lam du lhag ma 'dod pa rnams 'chags su gzhug go //
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable, you must make amends for your downfall in accordance with the Teaching. The whole community will make amends for their downfalls in accordance with your example.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt want that.‚Äù

original: 'di la mi 'dod pa de la gleng par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la mi 'dod pa de la gleng par mi bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúYou should not speak against it.‚Äù

original: gal te tshes bco lnga la thams cad kyis ltung ba shes sam yid gnyis su gyur na len par byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dge slong 'ga' zhig rang gi phyir bcos pa'i don du gnas gzhan du gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te tshes bco lnga la thams cad kyis ltung ba shes sam yid gnyis su gyur na len par byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dge slong 'ga' zhig rang gi phyir bcos pa'i don du gnas gzhan du gtang bar bya'o //
translated: If on the fifteenth day, all the monks know or have doubts about a transgression, then in order to establish the taking of the po·π£adha ceremony, a monk should be sent to another monastery for the purpose of confessing his transgression.

original: ma grub na byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsol ba bya ba 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub na byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsol ba bya ba 'dod par bya'o //
translated: If he is not successful, he should request the consecration of the po·π£adha ceremony.

original: bzhi pas nyung ba nyid la yang gtsug lag khang gi bya ba gnas pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: bzhi pas nyung ba nyid la yang gtsug lag khang gi bya ba gnas pa kho na yin no //
translated: If there are less than four monks, the ceremony of the monastery should be postponed.

original: stan thabs nyams par mi bya'o //
analyzed: stan thabs nyams par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not let the opportunity for the ceremony pass.

original: chag chag dang phyag @58b dar dang lci ba sar pas byug pa bya ba dang / seng ge'i khri bsham pa dang mar me gzugs pa dang chos nyan du gzhug pa dag byas la /
analyzed: chag chag dang phyag @58b dar dang lci ba sar pas byug pa bya ba dang / seng ge'i khri bsham pa dang mar me gzugs pa dang chos nyan du gzhug pa dag byas la /
translated: One should sprinkle the ground, sweep it, smear it with fresh cow dung, set up the lion seat, light lamps, and invite the Dharma teacher.

original: phyogs chos mthon por 'dug ste phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs chos mthon por 'dug ste phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Having sat on a high seat, he should look in the four directions.

original: dge slong dag 'ong ba snang na kye tshe dang ldan pa myur ba myur bar shog shig deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong ngam dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag 'ong ba snang na kye tshe dang ldan pa myur ba myur bar shog shig deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong ngam dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If the monks are seen coming, he should say, ‚ÄúVenerable ones, come quickly! Today is the fifteenth, the day of the po·π£adha and pravƒÅra·πáa of the sa·πÉgha.‚Äù

original: gzhir ma tshang na dus kyi bar du bsdad de byin gyis brlab par bya'o //üîΩ'ba' zhig na 'dug ste'o //üîΩlhag ma gzhan dang bcas pa yin na mdun du'o //
analyzed: gzhir ma tshang na dus kyi bar du bsdad de byin gyis brlab par bya'o // 'ba' zhig na 'dug ste'o // lhag ma gzhan dang bcas pa yin na mdun du'o //
translated: If the quorum is not complete, he should wait until the quorum is complete and then perform the consecration.üîΩIf he is alone, he should recite the three refuges.

original: gsum ne 'khod do //
analyzed: gsum ne 'khod do //
translated: If he is with others, he should recite the three refuges in front of them.üîΩIf there are three of them, they should perform the pravƒÅra·πáa.

original: bzhi'i dgag dbye yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi'i dgag dbye yang de bzhin no //
translated: If there are four of them, they should do the same.

original: de'i tshe gnas na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don nus pa med par shes na gso sbyong la bsdad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe gnas na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don nus pa med par shes na gso sbyong la bsdad par mi bya'o //
translated: If he knows that he is unable to recite the PrƒÅtimok·π£a S≈´tra, he should not stay for the po·π£adha.

original: gang na de las 'da' ba der nye bar 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang na de las 'da' ba der nye bar 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not go to a place where he would be beyond the range of the sound.

original: gnas par khas blangs pa phyi ma'i gong ma bsrung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnas par khas blangs pa phyi ma'i gong ma bsrung bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not protect the later higher vows that he has taken.

original: de la yang zla ba gnyis las lhag pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang zla ba gnyis las lhag pa'o //
translated: He should not stay there for more than two months.

original: gnas dang las dang rnyed pa dang bsnyen bkur ba bstabs pas 'don par byed pa gnyer bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas dang las dang rnyed pa dang bsnyen bkur ba bstabs pas 'don par byed pa gnyer bar bya'o //
translated: One should welcome them by offering a place to stay, work, goods, and honors.

original: mdo sde 'dzin pa 'ong ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dag gis bsu bar bya'o //
analyzed: mdo sde 'dzin pa 'ong ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dag gis bsu bar bya'o //
translated: One should go out to meet the bearer of the Sutra, with parasols, banners, pennants, etc.

original: 'dul ba dang ma mo yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dul ba dang ma mo yang ngo //
translated: The Vinaya and the Abhidharma should be treated in the same way.

original: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du'o //
translated: One should go out to meet them for a distance of two or three krosha.

original: ma nus na rgyang grags lngar ro //
analyzed: ma nus na rgyang grags lngar ro //
translated: If one is unable, for five dhanus.

original: gsum mam dpag tshad phyed dam rgyang grags sam rgyang grags phyed dam khyams su yang rung ngo //
analyzed: gsum mam dpag tshad phyed dam rgyang grags sam rgyang grags phyed dam khyams su yang rung ngo //
translated: Or three, or one krosa, or one dhanus, or half a dhanus, or in the courtyard.

original: ngag gi ba shes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ngag gi ba shes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blang bar bya'o //
translated: Having welcomed them with words of welcome, one should take their bowls and robes.

original: khrus bya'o // dge 'dun la yang snum bag gi rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: khrus bya'o // dge 'dun la yang snum bag gi rnyed pa'o //
translated: One should wash their feet and offer them oil for the feet.

original: gnas la sogs pa bstabs pa sbyin no //
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa bstabs pa sbyin no //
translated: One should offer them a place to stay, etc.

original: chos mnyan pa yang ngo //
analyzed: chos mnyan pa yang ngo //
translated: One should listen to the Dharma.

original: dge slong phrag dog can la 'di dag bstan pa 'dzin pa yin no zhes go bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong phrag dog can la 'di dag bstan pa 'dzin pa yin no zhes go bar bya'o //
translated: One should make it known to the envious bhiksus that they are bearers of the Teaching.

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas pas de'i nyin mo rang gi de yod pa'i gnas nas 'gro bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas pas de'i nyin mo rang gi de yod pa'i gnas nas 'gro bar mi bya ste /
translated: One should not go from that place on the day when the po·π£adha or the pravƒÅra·πáa is held.

original: gal te de nyid kyi tshe rnam pa de lta bur phyin pa'am 'thab krol can dag dang 'bral ba'am spyod pa bzang po can dag dang phrad pa de lta bur 'gro ba nyid ma yin na'o //üîΩspyod pa bzang bo can gyi dge slong dang bcad pa nas @59a * //
analyzed: gal te de nyid kyi tshe rnam pa de lta bur phyin pa'am 'thab krol can dag dang 'bral ba'am spyod pa bzang po can dag dang phrad pa de lta bur 'gro ba nyid ma yin na'o // spyod pa bzang bo can gyi dge slong dang bcad pa nas @59a * //
translated: If one goes on that day, one should not go in such a way that one arrives on that day, or in such a way that one is separated from those who are quarrelsome, or in such a way that one meets those who are of good character.

original: 'thab krol can gyi dge slong dang bcas par 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'thab krol can gyi dge slong dang bcas par 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not go with a monk who is of good character, or with a monk who is quarrelsome.

original: dge slong dang bcas pa nas dge slong med par lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig ma yin pa'am /üîΩgnod pa dang lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dang bcas pa nas dge slong med par lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig ma yin pa'am / gnod pa dang lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not go with a monk, or without a monk, or with the remaining ones.üîΩOne should not go except for the sake of harm, or for the sake of physical and mental tranquility.

original: 'gro ba'i phyir gnas pa gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas bar dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i phyir gnas pa gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas bar dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abandon the place where one is staying in order to go to the po·π£adha or the pravƒÅra·πáa.

original: rkyen de lta bu nyid yod na spyod pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang 'don pa dang ldan pa'i gnas bstan nas der 'gror gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rkyen de lta bu nyid yod na spyod pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang 'don pa dang ldan pa'i gnas bstan nas der 'gror gzhug par bya'o //
translated: If such a condition exists, one should explain the place of good conduct and recitation and cause them to go there.

original: bsgo ba de las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bsgo ba de las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not transgress that order.

original: phyis 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du de gnyis yang byar rung ngo //
analyzed: phyis 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du de gnyis yang byar rung ngo //
translated: Later, for the sake of those who have come, those two are also suitable to be done.

original: gal te legs par na de la ci dgar 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te legs par na de la ci dgar 'jug par bya'o //
translated: If it is good, one should engage in it as one wishes.

original: 'dun pa mthun bdag la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dun pa mthun bdag la yang ngo //
translated: Also, for oneself, if one's intention is in harmony.

original: gzhan gyis tshogs pa gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis tshogs pa gsol bar bya'o //
translated: One should request the assembly of others.

original: de ma thob na mtshams gzhan du bya'o //
analyzed: de ma thob na mtshams gzhan du bya'o //
translated: If that is not obtained, one should do it in another boundary.

original: byed pa'i tshe 'ongs na lhag ma nyams su myong bas 'grub bo //
analyzed: byed pa'i tshe 'ongs na lhag ma nyams su myong bas 'grub bo //
translated: If one who is doing it comes, the remainder is accomplished by experiencing.

original: gnas de nas 'ga' yang ma song ba nyid yin na nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas de nas 'ga' yang ma song ba nyid yin na nges pa yin no //
translated: If no one at all has left that place, it is definite.

original: glo bur du lhags pa dag ches mang ba nyid yin na yang ngo //
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa dag ches mang ba nyid yin na yang ngo //
translated: If the newly arrived are even more numerous, it is also.

original: dus kyi phyir ni ches mang po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid yin no /
analyzed: dus kyi phyir ni ches mang po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid yin no /
translated: For the sake of time, one should follow the majority.

original: mnyam pa nyid yin na gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid yin na gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: If they are equal, then those who are naturally inclined.

original: 'di la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di la yang ngo //
translated: Here too.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs so /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs so /
translated: This is the chapter on the procedure of the Po·π£adha rite in the foundation of the Po·π£adha.

original: // / ting nge 'dzin las blang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: // / ting nge 'dzin las blang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not take it from a state of concentration.

original: gdams ngag med par bsgom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gdams ngag med par bsgom par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not meditate without instruction.

original: gdos bu dang pho long gi sbyor ba rigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gdos bu dang pho long gi sbyor ba rigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is proper to use a wooden plank and a pillow.

original: brtson 'grus lhod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus lhod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not slacken one's diligence.

original: de ni mdo sde las gsungs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni mdo sde las gsungs pa bzhin no //
translated: That is as stated in the s≈´tras.

original: lus dang sems dang gos ma 'char bas nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus dang sems dang gos ma 'char bas nyal bar bya'o //
translated: One should sleep without the body, mind, or clothes being exposed.

original: mi na bas nyin mo nyal bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi na bas nyin mo nyal bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sleep during the day except when sick.

original: ro rgyab na bas pus 'khyud bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ro rgyab na bas pus 'khyud bcang bar bya'o //
translated: One should hold the knees with the arms when sleeping on one's back.

original: dbang po rnams nang du bsdus pa dang yid phyi rol du ma song ba dang gsal ba dang drang pos mi thogs par bcag par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams nang du bsdus pa dang yid phyi rol du ma song ba dang gsal ba dang drang pos mi thogs par bcag par bya'o //
translated: One should fall asleep with the senses withdrawn, the mind not going outside, clear, and upright, without obstruction.

original: mi nus na tha gu bres te'o //
analyzed: mi nus na tha gu bres te'o //
translated: If one is unable, one should tie a rope.

original: kha ton pa'i 'chags ni khru bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: kha ton pa'i 'chags ni khru bcu gnyis so //
translated: The recitation hall is twelve cubits.

original: spong ba pa'i ni bco brgyad do //
analyzed: spong ba pa'i ni bco brgyad do //
translated: The one who is a PrƒÅtimok·π£a-holder has eighteen.

original: de tha gus gzhal te bya'o //
analyzed: de tha gus gzhal te bya'o //
translated: It is measured by a cubit.

original: dge slong gis @59b chos bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis @59b chos bshad par bya'o //
translated: A monk should expound the Dharma.

original: 'dug ste'o // gal te du ma nyid yin na gcig gis so //
analyzed: 'dug ste'o // gal te du ma nyid yin na gcig gis so //
translated: He should sit. If there are many, he should sit with one.

original: gang yang rung bas so //
analyzed: gang yang rung bas so //
translated: He should sit with whichever one is suitable.

original: ma gsol bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: ma gsol bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not do it without being asked.

original: gal te de'i tshig gis byung ba ma yin na'o //üîΩgras mi bya'o //
analyzed: gal te de'i tshig gis byung ba ma yin na'o // gras mi bya'o //
translated: If he does not arise by the words of that one,üîΩhe should not do it in a group.

original: gra phyed kyis mi bya'o //
analyzed: gra phyed kyis mi bya'o //
translated: He should not do it in a half group.

original: gnyis kyis gcig tu mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis kyis gcig tu mi bya'o //
translated: He should not do it in two groups.

original: rgan rims kyis so //
analyzed: rgan rims kyis so //
translated: He should do it in the order of seniority.

original: gal te mang ba nyid yin na stan gnyis sam gsum bzhag ste'o //
analyzed: gal te mang ba nyid yin na stan gnyis sam gsum bzhag ste'o //
translated: If there are many, he should do it in two or three seats.

original: gal te stan de dag mi thob pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te stan de dag mi thob pa yin na'o //
translated: If those seats are not obtained,

original: seng ge'i khri la yang ngo //üîΩmchil ma'i snod gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i khri la yang ngo // mchil ma'i snod gzhag par bya'o //
translated: he should do it on a lion throne.üîΩHe should place a spittoon.

original: der bcal blugs so //
analyzed: der bcal blugs so //
translated: He should put ashes in it.

original: phye ma'am thal ba'o //
analyzed: phye ma'am thal ba'o //
translated: He should put either dust or ashes.

original: de dus dus su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dus dus su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: He should clean it from time to time.

original: chos brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i nub mo chos mnyan par bya'o //
analyzed: chos brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga'i nub mo chos mnyan par bya'o //
translated: He should listen to the Dharma on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth nights.

original: nad pas de ma byas pa la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: nad pas de ma byas pa la ni nyes pa med do //
translated: If a sick person does not do it, there is no fault.

original: de smra ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa mi gnod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de smra ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa mi gnod par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not hinder the request for teaching.

original: mi nus pa la sogs pa yin na gsol ba 'debs pa la shad kyis spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi nus pa la sogs pa yin na gsol ba 'debs pa la shad kyis spang bar bya'o //
translated: If one is unable to do so, one should explain the situation to the requestor.

original: smra ba po med na rim gyis dran par bya zhing tha na tshigs su bcad pa re re tsam yang smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: smra ba po med na rim gyis dran par bya zhing tha na tshigs su bcad pa re re tsam yang smra bar bya'o //
translated: If there is no teacher, one should teach oneself, gradually, even if it is only a single verse.

original: der mang me gzugs so //
analyzed: der mang me gzugs so //
translated: One should set up a high seat there.

original: khyams su chos nyan pa'i zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu'am rdzing bu'i rnam pa lta bur bsham par bya'o //
analyzed: khyams su chos nyan pa'i zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu'am rdzing bu'i rnam pa lta bur bsham par bya'o //
translated: One should set up a high seat there, like a half-moon for listening to the Dharma, or like a pond.

original: bla gab med par chos nyan na bla re gdags so //
analyzed: bla gab med par chos nyan na bla re gdags so //
translated: If one listens to the Dharma in the open air, one should set up a canopy.

original: rlung dang char 'bab na btul lo //
analyzed: rlung dang char 'bab na btul lo //
translated: If there is wind or rain, one should ward it off.

original: der chos nyan pa dag dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: der chos nyan pa dag dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abandon those who listen to the Dharma there.

original: der gnas brtan dang por 'dug ste yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar bsdad nas chos smra bar bya ba'am gzhan la dge slong chos smros shig ces gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: der gnas brtan dang por 'dug ste yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar bsdad nas chos smra bar bya ba'am gzhan la dge slong chos smros shig ces gsol bar bya'o //
translated: The elder should sit there first, remain silent for a moment, and then teach the Dharma, or request another to do so, saying, ‚ÄúBhik·π£us, teach the Dharma!‚Äù

original: smra ba na sems gtad de gal te chos yin na spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: smra ba na sems gtad de gal te chos yin na spro bar bya'o //
translated: When teaching, one should focus the mind. If it is the Dharma, one should be enthusiastic.

original: gal te ma yin na bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te ma yin na bzlog par bya'o //
translated: If not, he should turn them away.

original: der khyim pa lhags pa rnams la chos la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
analyzed: der khyim pa lhags pa rnams la chos la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
translated: If householders come, he should give them a talk on the Dharma that is in conformity with Dharma.

original: mu stegs can klan ka tshol zhing gnas na legs par tshar bcad cing khrob mi bstan par bzod par bya'o //
analyzed: mu stegs can klan ka tshol zhing gnas na legs par tshar bcad cing khrob mi bstan par bzod par bya'o //
translated: If tƒ´rthikas come looking for an argument, he should defeat them well, but without anger.

original: ston pas 'khor khrid de 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: ston pas 'khor khrid de 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: He should not go out with a retinue of students.

original: de dag 'gro na chos kyi sgor gzud par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag 'gro na chos kyi sgor gzud par bya'o //
translated: If they go out, he should introduce them to the door of the Dharma.

original: rje sa dang bcas pa dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang sems dma' bas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rje sa dang bcas pa dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang sems dma' bas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: He should enter (the monastery) with respect, with humility, and with a humble mind.

original: gus par byas te bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gus par byas te bstan par bya'o //
translated: He should teach with respect.

original: chos la gus pa dang bcas @60a * //
analyzed: chos la gus pa dang bcas @60a * //
translated: He should be full of respect for the Dharma.

original: pa dang bstan pa dang yid mi g-yeng bas rigs pa dang grol ba'i tshig dag gis so //
analyzed: pa dang bstan pa dang yid mi g-yeng bas rigs pa dang grol ba'i tshig dag gis so //
translated: He should teach with words that are logical and liberating, with a mind that is not distracted.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin du thogs pa med par brjod pa dag gis so //
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin du thogs pa med par brjod pa dag gis so //
translated: He should teach with words that are not obstructed and that express the meaning as it is.

original: ma 'dres par ro //
analyzed: ma 'dres par ro //
translated: He should teach without mixing (the Dharma) with other things.

original: 'brel par ro //
analyzed: 'brel par ro //
translated: He should teach with a connected presentation.

original: byams pa dang snying rje dang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis sa //
analyzed: byams pa dang snying rje dang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis sa //
translated: He should teach with a mind of love, compassion, and no material desires.

original: rangs pa dang mos pa dang dga' ba byed pas so //
analyzed: rangs pa dang mos pa dang dga' ba byed pas so //
translated: By being satisfied, interested, and delighted.

original: don gyi dbang gis ma rdzogs nas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: don gyi dbang gis ma rdzogs nas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: If the meaning is not complete, it should be set aside.

original: dbyangs kyi chos smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi chos smra bar bya'o //
translated: One should speak the Dharma with a melodious voice.

original: langs nas rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: langs nas rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
translated: Having arisen, one should analyze.

original: don bsdus te brjod par yang bya'o //
analyzed: don bsdus te brjod par yang bya'o //
translated: One should also summarize and express the meaning.

original: gal te gzung ba dang gzhung gzugs pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: gal te gzung ba dang gzhung gzugs pa la yang ngo //
translated: If one is writing down the text, one should also do that.

original: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smyig ma'i thur ma skud pa la brgyus pa spo bas nyi ma bgrang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smyig ma'i thur ma skud pa la brgyus pa spo bas nyi ma bgrang bar bya'o //
translated: The elder of the Sa·πÖgha should count the days using a bamboo stick strung with thread.

original: dge bskos kyis de las brtags te dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge bskos kyis de las brtags te dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o //
translated: The assigner of duties should check that and announce it to the Sa·πÖgha.

original: bye brag tu byas pa'i'o //
analyzed: bye brag tu byas pa'i'o //
translated: The one that is specified.

original: ro'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: ro'i dbye bas so //
translated: By the division of corpses.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gdon par dge slong rnams la bskul ba'i tshig bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gdon par dge slong rnams la bskul ba'i tshig bya'o //
translated: For the sake of the owner of the monastery and the gods, one should recite verses and make statements to the monks.

original: mdo la'o // deng ni yar gyi ngo'i chos gcig lags te /
analyzed: mdo la'o // deng ni yar gyi ngo'i chos gcig lags te /
translated: In the s≈´tras. Today is the first day of the waxing moon.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang gtsug lag khang gi lha rnams kyi slad du tshigs su bcad pa re re ba klag tu gsol zhes so //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang gtsug lag khang gi lha rnams kyi slad du tshigs su bcad pa re re ba klag tu gsol zhes so //
translated: For the sake of the owners of the monastery and the gods of the monastery, please recite one verse each.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bdag pos spyan 'dren pa'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bdag pos spyan 'dren pa'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The owner of the monastery should also say the words of invitation.

original: yon bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas sang dge 'dun ba shos la spyan 'dren na btsun pa rnams kyis de la dge legs kyi yid dag gis so so nas thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol zhes so //
analyzed: yon bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas sang dge 'dun ba shos la spyan 'dren na btsun pa rnams kyis de la dge legs kyi yid dag gis so so nas thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol zhes so //
translated: The patron named so-and-so invites the Sa·πÖgha for tomorrow. Venerable ones, please favor him with your virtuous minds.

original: nyin zhag gcig gis mi chog par bya'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig gis mi chog par bya'o //
translated: It should not be done in one day.

original: dus tshigs rnams kyi zla ba phyed lus pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: dus tshigs rnams kyi zla ba phyed lus pa nyid la'o //
translated: In the remaining half month of the seasons.

original: zla ba shol dor ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas so //
analyzed: zla ba shol dor ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas so //
translated: The intercalary month is to be followed by the king.

original: rgyu skar ni skar mkhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar ni skar mkhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas shes par bya'o //
translated: The lunar mansion is to be known by following the astrologers.

original: 'di la dgos pa ni tha snyad la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la dgos pa ni tha snyad la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: The purpose here is to become skilled in convention.

original: ma brtags shing gso sbyong la ma bsdad par 'di stong pa zhig go snyam zhing mtshams gcad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ma brtags shing gso sbyong la ma bsdad par 'di stong pa zhig go snyam zhing mtshams gcad par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not imagine that the boundary is empty and cut off, unless one has examined it and has not remained in the po·π£adha.

original: bcad pa nyid du shes pa nyid ni mi 'chags pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: bcad pa nyid du shes pa nyid ni mi 'chags pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
translated: The very knowledge that it is cut off is not a part of the non-transgression.

original: de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su 'gyur ro //
translated: By its absence, one is at ease.

original: rung ba'i khang pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rung ba'i khang pa yang ngo //
translated: It is also a suitable house.

original: @60b mtshams su mtshams kyi bskor du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: @60b mtshams su mtshams kyi bskor du mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not suitable to make a boundary within a boundary.

original: dkyil 'khor ba dang dge slong ma'i dbyar khang dang khron pa dag la ni rung ngo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ba dang dge slong ma'i dbyar khang dang khron pa dag la ni rung ngo //
translated: It is suitable for the mandala and the nuns‚Äô retreat house and well.

original: shing ljon pa gcig la mtshams bzhi man chad kyi mu thug du ma rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: shing ljon pa gcig la mtshams bzhi man chad kyi mu thug du ma rnam par gnas so //
translated: In one tree, the four boundaries and so on are established without limit.

original: 'di la tha snyad du rung ba mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la tha snyad du rung ba mtshan ma yin no //
translated: In this, the sign of what is suitable conventionally is.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma byas pa dag kyang de ltar gyur pa nyi ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma byas pa dag kyang de ltar gyur pa nyi ma yin no //
translated: The creation of miracles and illusions is also like that.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i 'od dang dpa' klong gi rlabs dag kyang mi brtan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i 'od dang dpa' klong gi rlabs dag kyang mi brtan pa nyid yin no //
translated: The light of the moon, sun, and stars and the waves of the ocean are also unstable.

original: mtshams su chu ni mtshams gzhan dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mtshams su chu ni mtshams gzhan dang 'dra'o //
translated: The water is like the other sides.

original: bar du chod na gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: bar du chod na gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: If there is an obstacle, there is no unity.

original: gal te zam pa brtan po nyid yin na yul nyid yin no //üîΩde zhig pa yang phyir byas na ni rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: gal te zam pa brtan po nyid yin na yul nyid yin no // de zhig pa yang phyir byas na ni rjes su 'jug go //
translated: If the bridge is firm, there is a place.üîΩIf the bridge is destroyed and is not repaired, the possession is lost.

original: sbyor ba ma btang ba nyid do //
analyzed: sbyor ba ma btang ba nyid do //
translated: The possession is not lost if the bridge is not destroyed.

original: zhag bdun phan chad ni mi 'jug go //
analyzed: zhag bdun phan chad ni mi 'jug go //
translated: If the bridge is destroyed, the possession is not lost if the bridge is repaired in less than seven days.

original: nam mkha' ni bar du chod par gyur pa yin pas de la yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad kyang med na 'brel pa lta ga la yod /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni bar du chod par gyur pa yin pas de la yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad kyang med na 'brel pa lta ga la yod /
translated: Space is not a place, for it is not an obstacle; it is not a place of anything.

original: dbus nas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' las lhag par mtshams bcad pa dag mi 'chags so //
analyzed: dbus nas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' las lhag par mtshams bcad pa dag mi 'chags so //
translated: One cannot establish a boundary in the sky, nor beyond the limit of three and a half yojanas from here.

original: 'og dang steng du sra ba dang 'brel ba la de tshun chad pa bzhi dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du sra ba dang 'brel ba la de tshun chad pa bzhi dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: The same for the earth, if it is not separated from the solid, that is to say, from the diamond wheel at the center of the earth.

original: sa gzhi mtshams ma bcad pa nyid du ni mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba mi chags so //
analyzed: sa gzhi mtshams ma bcad pa nyid du ni mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba mi chags so //
translated: One cannot establish a boundary in the sky, nor beyond the limit of three and a half yojanas from here.üîΩThe same for the earth, if it is not separated from the solid, that is to say, from the diamond wheel at the center of the earth.

original: bcad pa zhig na zhig go //üîΩdes ni de mi zhig go //
analyzed: bcad pa zhig na zhig go //üîΩdes ni de mi zhig go //
translated: The possession is lost when the boundary is destroyed.üîΩThe possession is not lost if the boundary is repaired in less than seven days.

original: mchod rten dang gtsang khang dang / gtsang khang byur bu dang 'khor sa dang gso sbyong gi gnas dag tu phyag dar bya ba nyid do //üîΩdge 'dun la 'dun pa la sogs pa phul pa nyid ni phul ba nyid yin no /
analyzed: mchod rten dang gtsang khang dang / gtsang khang byur bu dang 'khor sa dang gso sbyong gi gnas dag tu phyag dar bya ba nyid do // dge 'dun la 'dun pa la sogs pa phul pa nyid ni phul ba nyid yin no /
translated: The sweeping is done in the st≈´pa, in the temple, in the temple-courtyard, in the circumambulation-hall, and in the place of confession.üîΩThe offering is the offering of the robe, etc. to the Sa·πÖgha.

original: de las gang yang rung bas de brjod par bya ba nyid yin no //üîΩmtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas de dbul ba yang dbul du 'jug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de las gang yang rung bas de brjod par bya ba nyid yin no // mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas de dbul ba yang dbul du 'jug par mi bya'o //
translated: The announcement is the announcement of the robe-material by one of the monks.üîΩOne should not cause a monk who is outside the boundary to make the announcement.

original: brgyud pas mi bya'o //
analyzed: brgyud pas mi bya'o //
translated: Nor should one cause it to be announced by proxy.

original: na ba dang dbang med pa dang srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pa las gzhan pas 'bul ba la ni nyes byas so //
analyzed: na ba dang dbang med pa dang srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pa las gzhan pas 'bul ba la ni nyes byas so //
translated: If one causes a sick or powerless monk, or one who fears that his life or chastity might be endangered, to make the announcement, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: ma brjod pa ni ma gus pa las so //
analyzed: ma brjod pa ni ma gus pa las so //
translated: If one does not announce the robe-material out of disrespect, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: des 'jigs pa las mtshams kyi phyi rol nas khyer te 'ongs pa la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: des 'jigs pa las mtshams kyi phyi rol nas khyer te 'ongs pa la ni nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is afraid of being seized by the king, etc.

original: dge skos kyis gso sbyong gi tshe tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge skos kyis gso sbyong gi tshe tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang bar bya'o //
translated: The duties of the robe-attendant are to count the monks at the time of the Po·π£adha ceremony, and to distribute the voting tickets.

original: legs par thon pas gdon te tshig @61a * //üîΩphyed kyang ma 'khrul ba nyid na'o //üîΩdge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so //
analyzed: legs par thon pas gdon te tshig @61a * // phyed kyang ma 'khrul ba nyid na'o // dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so //
translated: If it is well-known, then by the elder of the community.

original: mi nus pa nyid yin na gnyis pa'i'o //
analyzed: mi nus pa nyid yin na gnyis pa'i'o //
translated: If he is unable, then by the second.

original: des kyang na gsum pa'i'o //
analyzed: des kyang na gsum pa'i'o //
translated: If he is unable, then by the third.

original: des kyang na res kyis so //
analyzed: des kyang na res kyis so //
translated: If he is unable, then by turns.

original: mi nus na gzhan la bcol bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi nus na gzhan la bcol bar bya'o //
translated: If he is unable, then it should be entrusted to another.

original: ma btub na dge 'dun gyis so ;
analyzed: ma btub na dge 'dun gyis so ;
translated: If he is unable, then by the community.

original: / rtag tu yang ngo //
analyzed: / rtag tu yang ngo //
translated: Always, too.

original: rtags na lhag ma gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: rtags na lhag ma gzhan gyis so //
translated: If it is permanent, then by another remainder.

original: dum bu 'dzin pa nyid yin na ji snyed kyis 'grub pa dag gis so //
analyzed: dum bu 'dzin pa nyid yin na ji snyed kyis 'grub pa dag gis so //
translated: If it is a fragment, then by as many as are able.

original: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na gnas mdzes pa 'dod pas grong dang mi nye bar gso sbyong byar mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na gnas mdzes pa 'dod pas grong dang mi nye bar gso sbyong byar mi rung ngo //
translated: If it is with fear, then it is not proper to perform the po·π£adha in a village near a beautiful place, because of desire.

original: 'gron mi sdod na 'gro bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: 'gron mi sdod na 'gro bzhin du bya'o //
translated: If the guest does not stay, then it should be performed while going.

original: sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsdus pas so //
analyzed: sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsdus pas so //
translated: If one does not desire sound, then by the brief.

original: de tsam na yang byin gyis brlab bo //
analyzed: de tsam na yang byin gyis brlab bo //
translated: If it is just that much, then it is consecrated.

original: dad pa can dang gtso bo dag dga' bar 'gyur ba lta na cho ga rjes su bsgrag pa la kha na ma tho ba med do //
analyzed: dad pa can dang gtso bo dag dga' bar 'gyur ba lta na cho ga rjes su bsgrag pa la kha na ma tho ba med do //
translated: If it is for the sake of pleasing the faithful and the laity, there is no offense in proclaiming the rite.

original: drung du gso sbyong byed pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: drung du gso sbyong byed pa la yang ngo //
translated: Also, when one is observing the purification fast in the presence of the monks.

original: phongs pa'i tshe khyim pa'i drung du bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: phongs pa'i tshe khyim pa'i drung du bshags par bya'o //
translated: When one is in distress, one may confess in the presence of a layperson.

original: de la cho ga rjes su bsgrag pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la cho ga rjes su bsgrag pa la yang ngo //
translated: In that case, one should proclaim the rite.

original: rgyal po la go bar bya ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: rgyal po la go bar bya ba la yang ngo //
translated: Also, when one informs the king.

original: gzhan ma rdzogs pa la mi 'chags pa med do //üîΩgdon par bya ba dang de'i tshad dang dus dang 'don par byed pa rnams de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni 'dir chos ma yin no //üîΩthos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das pa nyid ni song ba nyid yin no //üîΩgso sbyong gi gzhi dang 'brel pa rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i skabs so //üîΩgso sbyong gi gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: gzhan ma rdzogs pa la mi 'chags pa med do // gdon par bya ba dang de'i tshad dang dus dang 'don par byed pa rnams de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni 'dir chos ma yin no // thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das pa nyid ni song ba nyid yin no // gso sbyong gi gzhi dang 'brel pa rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i skabs so // gso sbyong gi gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: There is no offense if one does not confess to another who is not fully ordained.

original: // / dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o ;üîΩ/ zla ba gsum du bya'o //

original: tshes bcu drug la'o //
analyzed: tshes bcu drug la'o //
translated: On the sixteenth day.

original: dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya'i phyi de nyin par gyi'o //
analyzed: dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya'i phyi de nyin par gyi'o //
translated: The next day, on the full moon day of the middle summer month.

original: dbyar tha chungs nya'i'o //
analyzed: dbyar tha chungs nya'i'o //
translated: On the full moon day of the last summer month.

original: zhag bcu 'am zla ba phyed kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na gtsug lag khang byi dor bya'o //
analyzed: zhag bcu 'am zla ba phyed kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na gtsug lag khang byi dor bya'o //
translated: If it will happen within ten days or a half month, the temple should be cleaned.

original: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na zhe'o//
analyzed: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na zhe'o//
translated: Some say: after seven or eight days.

original: nyi ma snga ma la ni gnas mal bsdog go //
analyzed: nyi ma snga ma la ni gnas mal bsdog go //
translated: On the previous day, the bedding should be gathered.

original: khri'u dang chol zangs yan chad do //
analyzed: khri'u dang chol zangs yan chad do //
translated: Including the benches and the copper pots.

original: de stobs pa bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: de stobs pa bsko bar bya'o //
translated: The one who is able should be appointed.

original: mi nus na du ma'o //
analyzed: mi nus na du ma'o //
translated: If not, several people.üîΩHe should place the fragrant sticks wrapped in white cloth in a basket in the order of seniority and say:

original: des dri dag gis bskus pa'i tshul shing gzeb kyi sprog mar ras dkar po bting bas dkris pa dag rgan rims su bzhag @61b nas tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas 'di na khrims su bya ba 'di dang 'di yod de /
analyzed: des dri dag gis bskus pa'i tshul shing gzeb kyi sprog mar ras dkar po bting bas dkris pa dag rgan rims su bzhag @61b nas tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas 'di na khrims su bya ba 'di dang 'di yod de /
translated: Venerables, in this place there are these and these rules.

original: khyed cag las gang khrims su bya ba 'di dang 'dis gnas par spro ba des ni tshul shing long shig / khyed cag las sus kyang dbyar dge 'dun nang du 'khrug long bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyed cag las gang khrims su bya ba 'di dang 'dis gnas par spro ba des ni tshul shing long shig / khyed cag las sus kyang dbyar dge 'dun nang du 'khrug long bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: None of you should cause a dispute in the Sa·πÖgha during the rains retreat.üîΩIf any of you know of even the slightest matter, speak up!üîΩThe Sa·πÖgha will later investigate the matter of anyone who causes a dispute in the Sa·πÖgha during the rains retreat.

original: khyed cag las gang gis 'ga' zhig la cung zad shes pa des ni smros shig / khyed cag las gang dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun la 'khrug long skyed par 'gyur ba de la dge 'dun gyis phyis nye bar brtag par dgos so zhes dge slong rnams laüîΩgo bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyed cag las gang gis 'ga' zhig la cung zad shes pa des ni smros shig / khyed cag las gang dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun la 'khrug long skyed par 'gyur ba de la dge 'dun gyis phyis nye bar brtag par dgos so zhes dge slong rnams la go bar bya ba'o //
translated: The monks should be informed in this way.

original: gzhan gyis blang ba dang khas blang ba'i phyir dge 'dun la gsol ba bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis blang ba dang khas blang ba'i phyir dge 'dun la gsol ba bya'o //
translated: Because it is received from another and accepted, a request should be made to the Sa·πÖgha.

original: tshul shing brim mo //
analyzed: tshul shing brim mo //
translated: Distribute the voting tickets.

original: dang por ston pa'i blang ngo //
analyzed: dang por ston pa'i blang ngo //
translated: First, the teacher should take one.

original: gzhan dag gis ni stan las phyed 'phags pas so //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ni stan las phyed 'phags pas so //
translated: The others should take them while standing with one foot raised.

original: dge tshul rnams kyi ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dag gis so //
analyzed: dge tshul rnams kyi ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dag gis so //
translated: The novices should take them from their preceptors and instructors.

original: mjug tu gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi de yang ngo //üîΩdal bus de gzhag par bya'o //üîΩbgrangs nas gnas 'dir dge slong 'di snyed kyis tshul shing blangs so zhes go bar bya'o //
analyzed: mjug tu gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi de yang ngo // dal bus de gzhag par bya'o // bgrangs nas gnas 'dir dge slong 'di snyed kyis tshul shing blangs so zhes go bar bya'o //
translated: At the end, the resident monks should also be informed.üîΩThe monk who is the lowest in seniority should place the token in the center of the circle.

original: gnas kyi gzhi bstabs par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi gzhi bstabs par bya'o //
translated: The number of ballots should be announced, and the monks should be informed of the number of ballots that each monk has received.üîΩThe resident monks should be given their share of the monastery‚Äôs goods.üîΩThe resident monks should be asked to accept the monastery‚Äôs goods, which are to be distributed according to the qualities of the monks.

original: de dag gi sgo lcags dang lde mig blangs pas mdun du 'dug ste gnas brtan gtsug lag khang che ge mo ni rnyed pa dang bcas pa gos kyi rin dang bcas pa lags kyis bzhes shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa bskyed cing lenüîΩdu gzhug go //
